Tug kws khaws nyaj txag ca rua nwg xwb, tsw nplua nuj rua Vaajtswv kuj zoo ib yaam le ntawd ntaag.”
Yexu has rua nwg cov thwjtim tas, “Vem le nuav, kuv has rua mej tas, tsw xob txhawj txug mej txujsa tas yuav muab daabtsw lug noj, hab tsw xob txhawj txug mej lub cev tas yuav muab daabtsw lug naav,
tsua qhov txujsa tseem ceeb dua mov noj hab lub cev tseem ceeb dua tej tsoog tsho.
Ca le saib tej uab voj, tub tsw tseb tsw hlais hab tsw muaj txhaab tsw muaj phawv los Vaajtswv tseed yug tej uab voj hov. Mej yimfuab tswm txaj dua tej noog ntawd.
Mej cov muaj leejtwg txujkev txhawj yuav txuas tau nwg txujsa ntev ib tshwm ntxwv?
Yaam nyuas miv miv nuav mej tub ua tsw tau, es mej tseed yuav txhawj txug lwm yaam ua daabtsw?

Ca le tshuaj saib tej paaj lilij saib tuaj hlub le caag, tub tsw ua num hab tsw ntus ntaub. Tassws kuv has rua mej tas, txawm yog Xalaumoo naav nwg tej tsoog tsho meej mom huvsw los tub zoo tsw cuag ib lub nyuas paaj ntawd.

Tej nroj tsuag kws nyob tom teb nub nua xwb, pigkig tub yuav muab nrum rua huv cub suavtawg, yog Vaajtswv tub pub rua naav le ntawd, mej cov kws kev ntseeg yau 'e, nwg yimfuab yuav pub rua mej naav hab.
Tsw xob nrhav yuav noj daabtsw yuav haus daabtsw, tsw xob txhawj,
tsua qhov ib tsoom tebchaws huv nplajteb yeej nrhav tej nuav. Mej leej Txwv yeej paub lawm tas mej cheem tsum tej nuav.
Tassws mej yuav tsum nrhav Vaajtswv lub tebchaws, mas yuav muab tej nuav tsaav rua mej.
“Paab nyuas yaaj miv miv, mej tsw xob ntshai, vem tas mej leej Txwv txaus sab pub lub tebchaws hov rua mej.

Ca le muab tej kws mej muaj muag hab pub rua cov pluag. Ca le ua lub naas nyaj kws tsw txawj qub rua mej, yog tej nyaj txag sau ntuj kws tsw txawj taag le. Qhov ntawd tub saab tuaj tsw tau ze hab kaab ntsaum ua tsw tau kuas puam tsuaj.
Tsua qhov mej tej nyaj txag nyob hovtwg, mej lub sab yeej nyob hov ntawd.
“Mej ca le sa hlaab khov kho hab taws mej lub teeb ca,
hab ua zoo le cov kws tog rawv puab tug lospaav moog ua tshoob rov lug, mas thaus nwg lug khob qhov rooj puab txhad qheb hlo taamswm rua nwg.

Cov qhev kws tug lospaav lug pum tseed tog rawv kuj tau nyob kaaj sab lug. Kuv has tseeb rua mej tas tug lospaav yuav sa hlaab khov kho hab ca cov tub qhe nyob ntawm rooj mov mas nwg yuav lug ua koom rua puab.
Yog tug lospaav lug thaus ib taag mo lossws qab qua nwg pum tas cov tub qhe tseed tog rawv, cov tub qhe hov yuav nyob kaaj sab lug.
Ca le paub tas, yog tug tswv tsev xub paub tas tub saab yuav tuaj thaus twg, nwg yuav tsw kheev kuas tho tau nwg lub tsev.
Yog le nuav mej yuav tsum npaaj txhwj tsua qhov Tuabneeg leej Tub yuav lug rua teev kws mej tsw ncu xaav txug.”
Petu has tas, “Tug Tswv, koj has zaaj paaj lug nuav rua peb xwb los has rua suavdawg hab?”
Tug Tswv has tas, “Leejtwg yog tug tub qhe saib tsev kws ncaaj hab ntse kws tug lospaav yuav tsaa saib cov tub qhe hab faib mov rua puab noj lawv swjhawm?
Thaus tug lospaav lug pum nwg ua num le hov, tug qhev hov yuav tau nyob kaaj sab lug.
Kuv has tseeb rua mej tas, tug lospaav yuav tsaa nwg ua tug saib taag nrho lospaav tej cuab txhaj cuab taam huvsw.
Tassws yog tug qhev hov xaav huv lub sab has tas, ‘Kuv tug lospaav lug qeeb,’ tes nwg txawm chiv muab cov tub qhe nkauj qhev ntaus hab noj tsau haus qaug,
mas nwg tug lospaav yuav lug rua nub kws nwg tsw ncu xaav txug hab teev kws nwg tsw paub, mas tug lospaav yuav muab nwg tsuav ua tej dwb daim hab tu chaw rua nwg nrug cov kws tsw ntseeg nyob ua ke.
Mas tug qhev hov kws tub paub tug lospaav lub sab tassws tsw npaaj hab tsw ua lawv nraim yuav raug nplawm nyaav heev.

Tassws tug kws tsw paub es ua yaam kws tswm nyog raug nplawm, los nwg yuav raug nplawm mivntswv xwb. Txhua tug kws tau txais ntau yuav raug rob ntawm nwg ntau. Hab tug kws luas muab ntau rua nwg, luas yuav thov thim ntawm nwg ntau dua.
“Kuv lug yog coj suavtawg lug rua huv lub nplajteb. Kuv xaav kuas cub suavtawg tub cig plawg lawm.
Kuv tseed yuav tsum ua dua ib yaam kevcai raus dej. Kuv yuav nyuaj sab kawg moog txug thaus ua tav lawd.
Mej xaav tas kuv lug yog coj kev sws hum xeeb lug rua lub nplajteb nuav lov? Kuv has rua mej tas, tsw yog. Kuv lug yog coj kev tawg sws faib lug.
Txwj nuav moog tswb leeg nyob ua ib tse los yuav tawg peb leeg tawm tsaam rua ob leeg, ob leeg tawm tsaam rua peb leeg.
Puab yuav sws faib, txwv tawm tsaam tub, tub tawm tsaam txwv, nam tawm tsaam ntxhais, ntxhais tawm tsaam nam, nam puj tawm tsaam nyaab hab nyaab tawm tsaam nam puj.”
Yexu has rua cov tuabneeg coob coob hov tas, “Thaus mej pum fuab laum nkaus saab nub poob mej has taamswm ntawd tas, ‘Naag yuav lug,’ tes txawm muaj le ntawd.
Thaus mej pum cua ntsawj saab nraag tuaj, mej kuj has tas, ‘Yuav kub heev,’ tes txawm muaj le ntawd.
Cov nam tuabneeg ncauj lug zoo sab phem, mej txawj saib lub nplajteb hab lub ntuj, txhad paub tas yuav muaj daabtsw tshwm lug. Vem le caag mej tsua tsw txawj saib tam nuav yuav muaj le caag?
“Ua caag mej tsw txav sab tas yaam twg raug cai?

Thaus koj nrug tug yeej kom ua ke moog tom tug tu plaub, ua tag nrhav kev nrug tug yeej kom has hum ntawm ntog kev, tsaam tes nwg coj koj moog cuag tug kws txav txem, mas tug txav txem yuav muab koj cob rua tug ceev xwm, hab tug ceev xwm muab koj kaw rua huv tsev lojfaaj.
Kuv has rua koj tas, koj yuav tawm tsw tau moog txug thaus them taag txhua npiv huvsw.”
Lub swjhawm ntawd muaj qee leej pav rua Yexu noog txug cov tuabneeg Kalilai kws Philaj tau muab puab cov ntshaav xyaw ua ke nrug cov ntshaav tsaj kws puab tua xyeem.
Yexu txawm has rua puab tas, “Mej xaav has tas cov Kalilai hov yog tuabneeg muaj txem heev dua cov Kalilai suavdawg tsua qhov puab raug le hov nua lov?
Kuv has rua mej tas, tsw yog le ntawd. Yog mej tsw ntxeev dua sab tshab mej txhua tug kuj yuav puam tsuaj ib yaam le puab.
Lossws kaum yim leej kws lub chaw tsom faaj huv Xilau‑aa pob lug tais tuag hov, mej xaav has tas puab ua txhum luj dua suavdawg kws nyob huv Yeluxalee nua lov?
Kuv has rua mej tas, tsw yog le ntawd. Yog mej tsw ntxeev dua sab tshab mej txhua tug kuj yuav puam tsuaj ib yaam le ntawd.”
Yexu has ib zaaj paaj lug tas, “Muaj ib tug yawm cog ib tsob txwv cua rua huv nwg lub vaaj txwv maab, nwg tuaj saib los tsw muaj txwv.
Nwg txawm has rua tug kws tu txwv maab tas, ‘Kuv tuaj saib tsob txwv cua nuav peb xyoos lawm los tsw pum muaj txwv le. Ca le muab ntuv pov tseg, yuav ca ntxoov aav do do ua daabtsw?’
Tug tu txwv maab teb nwg tas, ‘Yawm hlub, thov tseg ca ib xyoos hab, es kuv npoog aav hab rau chiv rua.
Yog lwm xyoo txw txwv kuj zoo. Yog tsw txw txwv koj le muab ntuv pov tseg kuj tau.’ ”
Muaj ib nub Xanpatau Yexu saamswm qhuab qha huv ib lub tsev sablaaj.
Muaj ib tug quaspuj raug daab ua rua nwg muaj mob tau kaum yim xyoo, nwg khoov duav sawv tsw tau ntseg le.
Thaus Yexu pum nwg, Yexu txawm hu tug puj hov lug has rua nwg tas, “Tug ntxhais 'e, koj dim koj tug mob lawm lauj!”
Thaus Yexu muab teg npuab nwg, taamswm ntawd nwg txawm sawv tau ntseg, hab nwg qhuas Vaajtswv.

Tassws tug thawj kws saib lub tsev sablaaj chim tsua qhov kws Yexu khu mob rua nub Xanpatau, nwg txawm has rua cov tuabneeg tas, “Muaj rau nub kws tswm nyog ua num, mej ca le tuaj khu mob rua rau nub ntawd, tsw xob tuaj khu rua nub Xanpatau.”
Tug Tswv txawm teb nwg tas, “Cov nam tuabneeg ncauj lug zoo sab phem, nub Xanpatau mej txhua tug tub daws nyuj daws neeg luav ntawm lub daab zaub caab moog haus dej los tsw yog?
Tug puj nuav yog Aplahaa le ib tug ntxhais kws raug Xataa  muab khi tau kaum yim xyoo lawm, tsw tswm nyog muab nwg daws kuas dim txuj hlua khi nuav rua nub Xanpatau lov?”
Thaus Yexu has le hov lawd, cov kws tawm tsaam nwg kuj raug txaaj muag, mas cov tuabneeg suavdawg zoo sab xyiv faab rua tej yaam zoo kws Yexu ua.
Yexu txawm has tas, “Vaajtswv lub tebchaws zoo le caag? Kuv yuav muab pev rua daabtsw?
Muab pev ib yaam le lub noob miv miv kws ib tug coj moog tseb rua huv nwg lub vaaj. Thaus tuaj hlub ua ib tsob ntoo, hab tej naag noog sau nruab ntug lug ua zeg rua sau tej ceg.”
Yexu has dua ib zag tas, “Kuv yuav muab Vaajtswv lub tebchaws pev rua daabtsw?
Yuav pev ib yaam le cov keeb kws ib tug quaspuj coj moog xyaw peb xe‑a  moov mog tog txug thaus cov moov mog hov su taag huvsw.”
Yexu moog huv tej moos hab tej zej zog qhuab qha taug kev moog rua Yeluxalee.
Muaj ib tug has rua nwg tas, “Tug Tswv, cov tuabneeg kws dim muaj tsawg tsawg xwb lov?” Yexu has rua puab tas,
“Yuav tsum swv zug nkaag lub qhov rooj nqaim moog, tsua qhov kuv has rua mej tas, muaj tuabneeg coob coob yooj xeeb nkaag moog tassws nkaag tsw tau.
Thaus tug tswv tsev tub sawv lug kaw qhov rooj lawm, mej yuav chiv moog nyob saab nrau khob qhov rooj has tas, ‘Tug Tswv, qheb rua peb hab.’ Nwg yuav teb mej tas, ‘Kuv tsw paub mej tuaj hovtwg tuaj.’
Thaus ntawd mej yuav chiv has tas, ‘Peb txeev nrug koj noj haus ua ke hab koj tau qha huv peb tej kev.’
Tassws nwg yuav has rua mej tas, ‘Kuv tsw paub sov mej tuaj hovtwg tuaj. Cov nam tuabneeg ua phem suavdawg, mej ca le tswv ntawm kuv moog.’

Qhov chaw ntawd yuav muaj kev quaj qes nav quas qawv rua thaus mej pum Aplahaa, Yiha hab Yakhauj hab cov xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug suavdawg nyob huv Vaajtswv lub tebchaws, tassws mej raug muab nrum rua saab nrau.
Yuav muaj tuabneeg tuaj saab nub tuaj saab nub poob saab peg saab nraag tuaj nyob tsawg koom rooj mov ua ke huv Vaajtswv lub tebchaws.
Saib maj, yeej yuav muaj cov kws ua tom tw rov ua cov thawj, hab cov thawj rov ua cov tom tw.”
Thaus ntawd cov Falixai qee leej tuaj has rua Yexu tas. “Koj ca le tswv ntawm nuav moog, tsua qhov Helauj xaav muab koj tua.”
Yexu txawm has rua puab tas, “Ca le moog has rua tug nam maa hov tas, ‘Saib maj, kuv yuav ntab daab tawm hab khu mob rua nub nua hab pigkig mas nub peb kuv yuav ua kuv teg num kuas tav.
Tassws nub nua, pigkig hab quas neeg kuv yuav tsum taug kev moog, tsua qhov tug xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug yuav raug tua tuag rua saab nrau Yeluxalee tsw tau le.’

“Au Yeluxalee, Yeluxalee 'e, koj yog tug kws tua cov xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug hab xuas pob zeb ntaus cov kws khaiv tuaj cuag koj tuag. Muaj ntau zag kuv tub yuav qaws koj cov mivnyuas lug ua ke ib yaam le tug puj qab puag nwg cov mivnyuas rua huv nwg phob tis, tassws mej tsw yeem hlo le.
Saib nawj, mej lub tuam tsev yuav raug muab tso tseg. Kuv has rua mej tas mej yuav tsw pum kuv moog txug thaus mej has tas, ‘Tug kws tuaj huv tug Tswv  lub npe tau nyob kaaj sab lug.’ ”
Muaj dua ib nub Xanpatau Yexu moog noj mov rua huv ib tug thawj Falixai tsev, mas puab saib ntsoov Yexu.
Txawm muaj ib tug yawm teg taw xaab o o tuaj nyob ntawm Yexu xubndag.
Yexu txawm nug cov xwbfwb kws paub kevcai hab cov Falixai tas, “Muaj cai khu mob rua nub Xanpatau los tsw muaj cai?”
Puab nyob ntsag tu. Yexu txawm ntsab nkaus tug hov hab khu nwg zoo hlo le tso nwg moog.
Yexu has rua puab tas, “Mej cov yog leejtwg muaj mivnyuas lossws nyuj kws poob rua huv qhov dej rua nub Xanpatau nwg yuav tsw muab rhu tawm lug taamswm ntawd lov?”
Mas puab teb tsw tau le.
Thaus Yexu pum cov tuabneeg kws hu tuaj ntawd xaiv saam tsum nyob xwb, nwg txawm ua paaj lug has rua puab tas,
“Thaus luas hu mej moog noj tshoob, mej tsw xob moog nyob saam tsum ntshai tsaam puab tub hu ib tug kws muaj meej dua koj tuaj,
mas tug kws hu meb ob leeg tuaj yuav lug has rua koj tas, ‘Ca tug nuav nyob lub chaw kod,’ tes koj yuav poob ntsej muag nqeg moog nyob lub rooj kws qeg kawg.

Thaus luas hu koj moog, ca le moog nyob lub rooj qeg ua ntej sub thaus tug kws hu koj lug has rua koj tas ‘Kwvluag, ca le moog nyob saam tsum,’ mas thaus hov koj txhad le tau koob meej taab meeg suavdawg kws tuaj koom noj mov ntawd.
Txhua tug kws tsaab ua luj yuav raug muab txu kuas qeg, hab tug kws txu fwjchim yuav raug muab tsaa ua luj.”

Mas Yexu txawm has rua tug kws hu Yexu moog noj mov hov tas, “Thaus koj muaj pluag noj tsw has pluag su pluag mo, tsw xob yog hu koj cov kwvluag lossws kwvtij lossws tej txheeb ze lossws tuabneeg zej zog kws nplua nuj xwb, tsaam tes puab rov hu koj txhad pauj tau koj.
Thaus koj muaj pluag noj ca le hu cov pluag, cov qhuav teg qhuav taw, cov tuag taw hab cov dig muag,
mas koj yuav tau moov zoo tsua qhov puab pauj tsw tau koj, mas yuav pauj rua koj thaus cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg caj sawv huv qhov tuag rov lug.”
Thaus ib tug kws nrug Yexu nyob ntawm rooj mov nov tej lug hov, nwg txawm has rua Yexu tas, “Tug kws yuav tau noj mov huv Vaajtswv lub tebchaws kuj nyob kaaj sab lug.”
Yexu has rua nwg tas, “Muaj ib tug yawm npaaj ib pluag noj luj heev hab hu qhua coob.
Thaus txug swjhawm noj nwg khaiv nwg tug tub qhe moog has rua cov kws tub hu lawd tas, ‘Ca le tuaj, tub npaaj txhua yaam txhwj lawm.’
Puab txhua tug nyag taug nyag yig. Ib tug has tas, ‘Kuv yuav teb lawm, kuv yuav tsum moog saib daim teb ntawd. Kuv tuaj tsw tau, xob tu sab.’
Muaj dua ib tug has tas, ‘Kuv yuav tau tswb nkawm nyuj ca, kuv yuav moog saib. Kuv tuaj tsw tau, xob tu sab.’
Muaj dua ib tug has tas, ‘Kuv nyav yuav quaspuj, vem le nuav kuv tuaj tsw tau.’

Tug tub qhe hov rov lug has tej nuav huvsw rua tug lospaav noog. Mas tug tswv tsev kuj chim txhad has rua tug tub qhe tas, ‘Ca le tawm moog sai sai tom tej kev luj hab tej kev miv huv lub moos coj cov pluag, cov qhuav teg qhuav taw, cov dig muag hab cov tuag taw tuaj noj.’
Tug tub qhe txawm lug has tas, ‘Yawm hlub, kuv tub ua txhua yaam lawv le koj has tseg lawm, tassws tseed tshuav chaw seem.’
Tug lospaav txawm has rua tug tub qhe tas, ‘Ca le tawm moog tom tej kev luj kev miv moog yuam cov tuabneeg ntawd kuas tuaj, txhad le muaj qhua puv kuv lub tsev.
Kuv has rua mej tas cov tuabneeg kws tub hu lawd tsw muaj ib tug yuav tau swm kuv rooj mov le.’ ”
Muaj tuabneeg coob coob nrug Yexu moog, mas Yexu tig lug has rua puab tas,
“Yog leejtwg lug cuag kuv es tsw ntxub nwg nam nwg txwv nwg quaspuj mivnyuas kwvtij nkauj muam hab nwg txujsa tug hov ua tsw tau kuv le thwjtim.
Leejtwg tsw kwv nwg tug khaublig ntoo lawv kuv qaab moog, tug hov ua tsw tau kuv le thwjtim.
Mej cov muaj leejtwg kws xaav ua lub chaw tsom faaj es yuav tsw xub nyob quas tsawg xaam txug tug nqe ua ntej tas muaj txaus ua kuas tav los tsw muaj?
Yog tsw ua le ntawd, thaus tub tag tej taw lawm nwg ua tsw tau kuas tav, mas txhua tug kws pum yuav thuaj luag nwg,
has tas, ‘Tug nuav chiv ua lawm, tassws nwg ua tsw tau kuas tav.’

Lossws muaj ib tug vaajntxwv twg kws yuav moog ua rog rua dua ib tug vaajntxwv, es tsw nyob tsawg ua tuab zoo xaav ua ntej saib muaj tub rog ib vaam leej yuav moog ua rog tau rua tug kws muaj ob vaam leej los tsw tau?
Yog ua tsw tau, mas thaus tug vaajntxwv hov tseed nyob deb nwg ca le khaiv tuabneeg moog thov kuas nyob sws raug zoo.
Ib yaam le ntawd, mej cov leejtwg tsw tso txhua yaam kws nwg muaj tseg mas ua tsw tau kuv le thwjtim.
“Ntsev yog yaam kws zoo, tassws yog ntsev tsuag lawm, yuav ua kuas rov daw tau le caag?
Swv ua chiv rau aav kuj tsw tau, muab tov xyaw quav tsaj kuj tsw tau, tsuas muaj kws muab laim pov tseg xwb. Leejtwg muaj qhov ntsej nov, ca le noog nawj!”
Cov tuabneeg sau se hab cov tuabneeg muaj txem suavdawg kuj txaav lug ze yuav noog Yexu qha.
Cov Falixai hab cov xwbfwb qha Vaajtswv kevcai ywg has tas, “Tug nuav leeg yuav cov tuabneeg muaj txem hab nrug puab noj ua ke.”
Yexu txawm ua paaj lug qha rua puab tas,
“Mej cov yog leejtwg muaj ib puas tug yaaj mas ib tug pluj lawm nwg yuav tsw tseg cuaj caug cuaj tug yaaj ca rua huv tshaav zaub es moog nrhav kuas tau tug kws pluj lawd lov?
Thaus nrhav tau lawd, nwg muab kwv hlo sau xubpwg zoo sab xyiv faab.
Thaus lug txug tsev, nwg hu kwvtij kwvluag zej zog tuaj ua ke has rua puab tas, ‘Ca le nrug kuv zoo sab, tsua qhov kuv tub nrhav tau kuv tug yaaj kws pluj lawm.’

Ib yaam nkaus le ntawd kuv has rua mej tas, yog ib tug tuabneeg muaj txem ntxeev dua sab tshab mas yuav muaj kev zoo sab xyiv faab sau ntuj ceeb tsheej heev dua le zoo sab rua cuaj caug cuaj tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg kws tsw txug ntxeev dua sab tshab.
“Lossws tug puj twg kws muaj kaum lub nyaj muaj ib lub pluj lawm yuav tsw taws teeb cheb vaaj cheb tse ua tuab zoo nrhav moog txug thaus tau lov?
Thaus nrhav tau lawd, nwg hu kwvtij kwvluag zej zog tuaj ua ke has rua puab tas, ‘Ca le nrug kuv zoo sab, tsua qhov kuv tub nrhav tau lub nyaj kws pluj lawm.’
Ib yaam nkaus le ntawd kuv has rua mej tas, yuav muaj kev zoo sab xyiv faab rua ntawm Vaajtswv cov tubkhai ntuj xubndag rua thaus ib tug tuabneeg muaj txem ntxeev dua sab tshab.”
Hab Yexu has tas, “Muaj ib tug yawm muaj ob tug tub.
Tug tub yau has rua leej txwv tas, ‘Txwv, thov faib tej cuab txhaj cuab taam kws yog kuv feem rua kuv.’ Leej txwv txawm muab faib rua ob tug tub.
Dhau ntawd tsw muaj tsawg nub tug tub yau txawm sau zog txhua yaam kws yog nwg le mas taug kev moog rua lwm lub tebchaws deb deb, hab muab nwg tej nyaj txag phob xuam phumlaam qos ntsuav.
Thaus nwg muab swv taag lawm, txawm muaj kev tshaib nqhes heev huv lub tebchaws hov, nwg txawm chiv tu pluag.
Nwg txawm moog nrhav zug ntawm ib tug tuabneeg huv lub tebchaws hov, tug hov txhad khaiv nwg moog yug npua tom teb.
Nwg yeej xaav noj tej plhaub taum kws npua noj ntawd, tsw muaj leejtwg pub daabtsw rua nwg noj le.
Thaus nwg xaav txug nwg lub neej nwg txawm has tas, ‘Kuv txwv cov tub zug muaj coob le caag los tseed tau noj tsau npo noj tsw taag, tassws kuv saamswm tuag tshaib rua ntawm nuav.
Kuv yuav sawv tseeg moog cuag kuv txwv hab has rua nwg tas, “Txwv, kuv ua txhum rua lub ntuj hab ua txhum rua koj lawm.
Tsw tswm nyog yuav hu kuv ua koj tug tub dua le lawm. Thov ca kuv zoo le koj ib tug tub zug xwb.” ’
Tes nwg txawm sawv tseeg moog cuag nwg txwv. Thaus nwg tseed lug txug deb, leej txwv pum nwg hab khuvleej nwg, txawm dha moog puag nwg hab nwj nwg.
Tug tub has rua leej txwv tas, ‘Txwv, kuv ua txhum rua lub ntuj hab ua txhum rua koj lawm. Tsw tswm nyog hu kuv ua koj tug tub dua le lawm.’
Tassws leej txwv has rua nwg cov tub qhe tas, ‘Ca le maaj nroog moog coj lub tsho ntev kws zoo kawg tuaj ua rua nwg naav, hab muab nplhaib rua nwg coj ntawm ntiv teg hab muab khau rua nwg rau.
Hab coj tug mivnyuas nyuj kws fwb rog rog lug tua, hab ca peb noj ua kev zoo sab xyiv faab,
tsua qhov kuv tug tub nuav tuag lawm los nwg caj rov lug, nwg pluj lawm los rov qaab ntswb dua.’ Puab chiv ua kev zoo sab xyiv faab.
“Tassws tug tub hlub nyob tom teb. Thaus nwg lug yuav txug tsev nwg kuj nov suab raaj suab nruag hab suab seev cev.
Nwg txawm hu ib tug tub qhe tuaj nug tas tej nuav yog daabtsw.
Tug tub qhe teb tas, ‘Koj tug kwv rov lug es koj txwv tua tug mivnyuas nyuj rog rog tsua qhov leej txwv tau tug tub yau rov lug nyob kaaj sab quas lug.’
“Tug tijlaug txawm chim tsw kaam nkaag lug tsev. Leej txwv txhad tawm tuaj thov nwg lug tsev.

Nwg teb leej txwv tas, ‘Swm saib, kuv ua koj qhev khwv ntau xyoo lug, tsw tau tawv koj tej lug ib lus le, los koj tub tsw muab ib tug mivnyuas tshws rua kuv sub kuv txhad tau nrug kuv cov phoojywg noj ua kev zoo sab xyiv faab.
Tassws koj tug tub nuav moog deev puj muag cev muab koj tej cuab txhaj cuab taam phob xuam taag, los thaus nwg rov lug koj tseed tua tug mivnyuas nyuj rog rog yug nwg hab.’
Leej txwv has rua nwg tas, ‘Tub 'e, koj yeej ib txwm nrug nraim kuv nyob, txhua yaam kws kuv muaj puavleej yog koj le.
Tswm nyog peb zoo sab xyiv faab hlo, tsua qhov koj tug kwv nuav tuag lawm los nwg caj rov lug, nwg pluj lawm los rov qaab ntswb dua.’ ”
Yexu kuj has rua cov thwjtim tas, “Ib tug nplua nuj muaj ib tug tub qhe kws saib nwg vaaj tse. Muaj tuabneeg kom rua tug nplua nuj tas tug tub qhe hov saamswm phob tug nplua nuj tej hov txhua chaw.

Tug nplua nuj txhad hu tug tub qhe hov lug has rua nwg tas, ‘Zaaj kws kuv tau nov txug koj le ntawd yog le caag? Muab phoo ntawv teev nyaj lug rua kuv saib, tsua qhov koj yuav ua tsw tau tug kws saib vaaj tse ntxwv moog lawm.’

Tug tub qhe hov xaav huv lub sab tas, ‘Kuv yuav ua le caag, tsua qhov tug lospaav muab kuv rhu tawm qhov kws ua tug saib tsev lawm? Yuav moog khawb aav kuj tsw muaj zug, moog thov khawv kuj txaaj muag.
Kuv paub lawm tas kuv yuav ua le caag, sub thaus kuv raug rhu tawm lawm lwm tug txhad hu kuv moog rua huv puab tsev.’
Nwg txawm hu cov kws tshuav nwg tug lospaav nqe lug ib tug zuj zug mas nug thawj tug tas, ‘Koj tshuav kuv tug lospaav npaum twg?’
Tug hov has tas, ‘Tshuav ib puas thoob roj.’ Tug tub qhe hov has rua nwg tas, ‘Ca le muab koj daim ntawv tshuav nqe lug nyob tsawg hab sau kag ua tswb caug thoob xwb.’
Hab nwg nug dua ib tug tas, ‘Koj tshuav npaum twg?’ Tug hov has tas, ‘Tshuav ib puas seev tsaaj mog.’ Tug tub qhe has rua nwg tas, ‘Ca le muab koj daim ntawv tshuav nqe lug sau ua yim caum seev.’
Tug lospaav kuj qhuas tug tub qhe tsw ncaaj hov vem nwg muaj tswvyim ua le ntawd. Tsua qhov tuabneeg nplajteb tam nuav muaj tswvyim ua num heev dua txujkev kaaj le mivnyuas.
Kuv has rua mej tas, ca le muab tej nyaj txag kws tsw ncaaj coj moog zeem kwvluag, sub thaus tej nyaj txag taag lawm luas txhad txais mej nyob huv lub chaw kws nyob moog ib txhws.
“Tug kws ua ncaaj rua tej yaam tsawg kuj yuav ua ncaaj rua tej yaam ntau. Tug kws ua tsw ncaaj rua tej yaam tsawg kuj yuav ua tsw ncaaj rua tej yaam ntau.
Yog le ntawd, yog mej ua tsw ncaaj rua tej nyaj txag kws tsw ncaaj, leejtwg yuav muab tej nyaj txag kws ncaaj cob rua mej?
Yog mej ua tsw ncaaj rua tej kws yog lwm tug le, leejtwg yuav muab tej kws yog mej le rua mej?

Tsw muaj leejtwg yuav ua qhev tau rua ob tug lospaav, tsua qhov nwg yeej yuav ntxub ib tug nyam ib tug, lossws yuav npuab ib tug saib tsw taug ib tug. Mej yuav ua Vaajtswv le qhev hab ua nyaj txag le qhev ua ke tsw tau.”
Thaus cov Falixai kws nyam nyaj txag nov tej lug hov puab txawm thuaj luag Yexu.

Tassws Yexu has rua puab tas, “Mej suav tas mej yog tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg taab meeg suavdawg, tassws Vaajtswv paub mej lub sab. Tsua qhov yaam kws tuabneeg saib tas muaj nqes yog yaam kws Vaajtswv pum tas qas vuab tsuab.

Tsuas muaj txuj kevcai hab cov xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug lug txug thaus Yauhaa tshwm lug xwb. Txwj ntawd lug, txuj xuv zoo has txug Vaajtswv lub tebchaws raug muab tshaaj tawm, mas suavdawg swv zug sws txeeb kev moog rua huv lub tebchaws ntawd.
Lub ntuj hab lub nplajteb yuav pluj yoojyim dua rhuav txuj kevcai ib nyuas teev pov tseg.
“Txhua tug nrauj quaspuj es nwg moog yuav dua quaspuj tshab, kuj yog ua txhum kev nkauj kev nraug, hab tug kws yuav ib tug puj nrauj ua quaspuj kuj yog nwg deev luas quaspuj.
“Muaj ib tug nplua nuj naav tsoog yimlaaj hab ntaub maag zoo zoo nyob xyiv faab noj seem noj so txhua nub.
Hab muaj ib tug pluag hu ua Laxalau ua kav txhaab thoob plawg ib ce pw ntawm tug nplua nuj lub rooj vaag.
Nwg xaav noj tug nplua nuj tej qub mov kws poob sau rooj lug, hab dev tseed lug muab nwg tej kav txhaab yaim.
Dhau ntawd tug pluag hov txawm tuag mas cov tubkhai ntuj qaws nwg moog rua ntawm Aplahaa lub xubndag. Tug nplua nuj kuj tuag hab muab log.
Thaus nwg raug tswm txom huv tub tuag teb nwg tsaa qhov muag saib pum Aplahaa nyob deb deb hab Laxalau nyob ntawm Aplahaa xubndag.

Tug nplua nuj txawm hu has tas, ‘Txwv Aplahaa 'e, thov khuvleej kuv lauj. Thov khaiv Laxalau tuaj muab nwg tug hauv ntiv teg raus dej lug tub kuv tug nplaig kuas laaj, tsua qhov kuv raug txom nyem heev kawg huv cov nplaim tawg nuav.’

“Tassws Aplahaa has tas, ‘Tub 'e, koj ca le ncu tas thaus koj tseed ua neej nyob koj tau txhua yaam zoo rua koj tassws Laxalau tau yaam kws phem kawg. Nwgnuav nwg tau kev nplig sab lawm, koj tsua raug kev txom nyem heev.

Tsw taag le ntawd nyob ntawm peb hab mej ntu nruab nraab muaj ib lub nam haav tub heev quas lawm, sub cov kws xaav hlaa tim nuav moog rua tim mej los tsw tau, hab cov tim mej hlaa lug tim peb los kuj tsw tau.’
Tug nplua nuj txawm has tas, ‘Yog le ntawd, kuv txwv, thov koj khaiv Laxalau rov moog rua tom kuv txwv tsev,
tsua qhov kuv tseed tshuav tswb tug kwv, kuas Laxalau moog qhuab ntuag puab sub puab txhad tsw lug raug tswm txom huv lub chaw nuav.’
Tassws Aplahaa has tas, ‘Puab muaj Mauxe hab cov xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug lawm, ca puab noog cov tuabneeg ntawd has.’
Nwg txawm has tas, ‘Txwv Aplahaa 'e, tsw tau le. Yog muaj ib tug tawm huv cov tuabneeg tuag moog cuag puab, puab txhad le ntxeev dua sab tshab.’
Aplahaa has rua nwg tas, ‘Yog puab tsw noog Mauxe hab cov xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug has, tes txawm yog muaj ib tug sawv huv qhov tuag lug los puab yeej yuav tsw ntseeg.’ ”
Yexu has rua nwg cov thwjtim tas, “Yeej yuav tsum muaj tej yaam ua kuas ua txhum, tassws tug kws ua rau lwm tug ua txhum yuav raug txom nyem lauj!
Mas muab ib txhwb zeb luj lug khi rua tug hov cej daab es muab nrum rua huv havtxwv kuj zoo dua le ca nwg ua rua cov mivnyuas yau nuav ib tug dawm.
Mej ca le ceev faaj zoo. Yog koj le kwvtij ua txhum ca le ntuag nwg, yog nwg ntxeev dua sab tshab ca le zaam txem rua nwg.
Yog ib nub nwg ua txhum rua koj xyaa zag hab tuaj cuag koj xyaa zag hab has rua koj tas, ‘Kuv ntxeev dua sab lawm,’ koj yuav tsum zaam txem rua nwg.”
Cov tubkhai has rua tug Tswv tas, “Thov koj tsaav kev ntseeg rua peb ntau zuj zug.”
Tug Tswv has tas, “Yog mej muaj kev ntseeg luaj le ib lub noob miv miv, mej yuav has tau rua tsob txwv cua nuav tas, ‘Ca le rhu hlo caag moog cog rua huv havtxwv,’ nwg kuj yuav noog mej lug.
“Yog mej muaj ib tug tub qhe moog laij teb lossws yug yaaj, mas thaus nwg lug tom teb lug, mej leejtwg yuav has rua nwg tas, ‘Lug nyob tsawg noj mov lauj’?
Nwg yuav tsw has rua tug tub qhe le nuav lov has tas, ‘Ca le npaaj rua kuv noj hab sa hlaab khov kho ua koom rua kuv moog txug thaus kuv noj haus taag, dhau ntawd koj le maav noj hab haus.’
Nwg yuav ua tug tub qhe tsaug vem tug tub qhe ua lawv le nwg has lov?
Ib yaam le ntawd, thaus mej ua txhua yaam lawv le kws has rua mej lawd, mej ca le has tas, ‘Peb yog cov tub qhe kws tsw tswm txaj. Peb tsuas ua lawv le teg num kws peb yuav tsum ua xwb.’ ”
Thaus Yexu moog nraag Yeluxalee nwg taug txujkev ntawm Kalilai hab Xamali nrwm teb.
Thaus nwg saamswm moog rua huv ib lub zog muaj kaum tug mob lis mob ruas tuaj ntswb nwg. Puab sawv ntsug deb deb,
hab hu nrov has tas, “Xwbfwb Yexu, thov khuvleej peb.”
Thaus Yexu pum dheev puab nwg txawm has rua puab tas, “Ca le moog qha mej lub cev rua cov pov thawj saib.” Thaus puab saamswm moog puab txawm zoo taag huv lawm.
Puab cov ntawd muaj ib tug, thaus nwg pum tas nwg zoo lawm tes nwg txawm rov lug qhuas Vaajtswv nrov nrov,
hab khwb nkaus rua ntawm Yexu kwtaw ua Yexu tsaug. Tug hov yog tuabneeg Xamali.
Yexu txawm has tas, “Muaj kaum leej zoo mob los tsw yog? Cuaj leeg hov dua twg lawm?
Tsw pum lwm tug rov lug qhuas Vaajtswv le, tsuas yog tug kws yog lwm haiv tuabneeg nuav lug xwb lov?”
Yexu txawm has rua tug hov tas, “Ca le sawv tseeg moog lauj. Koj txujkev ntseeg ua rua koj zoo lawm.”
Thaus cov Falixai nug Yexu tas Vaajtswv lub tebchaws yuav lug thaus twg, Yexu teb puab tas, “Thaus Vaajtswv lub tebchaws lug, yuav tsw muaj ib yaam daabtsw tshwm kws tuabneeg txawj paub hab pum.
Hab puab yuav tsw has tas, ‘Saib maj, nyob ntawm nuav,’ lossws ‘Nyob tod,’ tsua qhov Vaajtswv lub tebchaws yeej nyob huv plawv mej lawm.”
Yexu has rua cov thwjtim tas, “Yuav muaj ib lub swjhawm kws mej xaav pum nub kws Tuabneeg leej Tub rov lug, los mej yuav tsw pum.
Hab luas yuav has rua mej tas, ‘Moog saib maj, nyob tod,’ lossws ‘Saib maj, nyob ntawm nuav.’ Mej tsw xob moog, tsw xob lawv luas qaab moog.
Tsag lig xub laim ib saab ntuj ci moog txug dua ib saab ntuj le caag, nub kws Tuabneeg leej Tub lug yuav zoo ib yaam le ntawd.
Tassws ua ntej ntawd nwg yuav tsum raug kev tswm txom ntau yaam hab cov tuabneeg tam nuav yuav tsw leeg yuav nwg.
Tam kws Nau‑a nyob zoo le caag, mas nub kws Tuabneeg leej Tub lug yuav zoo ib yaam le ntawd.
Puab noj haus ua tshoob qua tub qua ntxhais moog txug nub kws Nau‑a nkaag rua huv lub nkoj hab dej lug nyaab hlo puab puam tsuaj taag huvsw.
Tam kws Lauj nyob kuj zoo ib yaam nkaus hab, puab noj haus ua laag ua luam cog qoob loos ua vaaj ua tsev,
tassws nub kws Lauj tawm huv lub moos Xauntoo, suavtawg lawj faaj poob sau ntuj lug hlawv puab puam tsuaj taag huvsw.
Nub kws Tuabneeg leej Tub tshwm plawg lug kuj yuav zoo ib yaam le ntawd.
Nub ntawd tug kws nyob sau txheej tsev laag tshaav, nwg tej hov txhua chaw tseed nyob huv tsev, los tsw xob nqeg lug muab. Hab tug kws nyob tom teb tsw xob tig rov lug ib yaam nkaus.
Ca le ncu txug Lauj tug quaspuj.
Tug kws xaav tau nwg txujsa yuav pam txujsa, tassws tug kws tso nwg txujsa tseg, mas yuav cawm tau nwg txujsa.
Kuv has rua mej tas, mo ntawd muaj ob leeg pw ib txaag, los yuav coj ib tug moog yuav tseg ib tug ca.
Muaj ob tug quaspuj zum zeb ua ke, los yuav coj ib tug moog yuav tseg ib tug ca.”
Puab txawm nug Yexu tas, “Tug Tswv, yuav muaj le nuav rua hovtwg?” Yexu teb puab tas, “Tsaj tuag hovtwg, daav noj twm yuav sau nthwv lug rua hov ntawd.”
Yexu has ib zaaj paaj lug rua puab noog qha kuas puab thov Vaajtswv tsw tseg le hab tsw xob qaug zug.
Nwg has tas, “Huv ib lub moos muaj ib tug yawm tu plaub kws tsw ntshai Vaajtswv hab tsw fwm tuabneeg.
Huv lub moos hov muaj ib tug puj ntsuag pheej tuaj has rua tug tu plaub hov tas, ‘Thov fwj kuv cai rua tug kws kom kuv.’
Thaus chiv thawj tug tu plaub hov tsw yeem ua le ntawd, tassws tom qaab nwg xaav huv lub sab tas, ‘Txawm yog kuv tsw ntshai Vaajtswv hab tsw fwm tuabneeg,
los vem tug puj ntsuag nuav pheej tuaj txob kuv, kuv yuav fwj nwg cai, tsaam tes qhov kws nwg pheej tuaj hov thaus kawg yuav ua rua kuv dhuav sab taag.’ ”
Tug Tswv has tas, “Ca le noog tug tu plaub tsw ncaaj hov tej lug.
Vaajtswv yeej yuav tsw fwj cov kws nwg xaiv ca lawd txuj cai lov, yog cov kws thov hu nwg nruab nub mo ntuj? Vaajtswv yuav nyaj taug lov?
Kuv has rua mej tas, Vaajtswv yuav fwj puab txujcai sai sai. Tassws thaus Tuabneeg leej Tub lug, nwg tseed yuav ntswb kev ntseeg huv lub nplajteb lov?”
Yexu has zaaj paaj lug nuav rua qee leej kws tso sab rua puab tug kheej tas puab ncaaj nceeg hab saib tsw taug lwm tug, tas
“Muaj ob tug moog thov Vaajtswv rua huv lub tuam tsev, ib tug yog Falixai, ib tug yog tuabneeg sau se.

Tug Falixai sawv ntsug thov huv lub sab tas, ‘Vaajtswv, kuv ua koj tsaug kws kuv zoo tsw thooj le lwm tug, tsw has cov kws ntxo luas, cov ua tsw ncaaj, cov kws deev luas quaspuj, hab tsw thooj le tug sau se nuav.
Ib lub chib su kuv yoo mov ob zag, kuv muab txhua yaam kws kuv tau ib feem kaum rua koj.’
Tassws tug sau se sawv ntsug deb tsawv, tsw kaam tsaa muag saib sau ntuj, nwg ntaus nwg hauv sab has tas, ‘Vaajtswv, thov khuvleej kuv kws yog tuabneeg muaj txem lauj!’

Kuv has rua mej tas, thaus moog tsev tug sau se nuav yog tug kws suav tau tas ncaaj nceeg, tsw yog tug Falixai ntawd. Tsua qhov txhua tug kws tsaab ua luj yuav raug muab txu kuas qeg, tassws tug kws txu fwjchim yuav raug muab tsaa ua luj.”
Muaj tuabneeg puag cov mivnyuas mog tuaj cuag Yexu xaav kuas Yexu kov cov mivnyuas hov. Thaus cov thwjtim pum kuj txwv puab.
Tassws Yexu hu cov mivnyuas lug has tas, “Ca cov mivnyuas yau lug cuag kuv, tsw xob taav puab, tsua qhov Vaajtswv lub tebchaws yog cov kws zoo le cov mivnyuas yau nuav tug.
Kuv has tseeb rua mej tas, leejtwg tsw leeg yuav Vaajtswv lub tebchaws ib yaam le ib tug mivnyuas yau, tug hov yuav nkaag tsw tau rua huv lub tebchaws ntawd.”
Muaj ib tug thawj coj nug Yexu tas, “Xwbfwb kws zoo kawg, kuv yuav tsum ua le caag kuv txhad tau txujsa ib txhws tsw kawg?”
Yexu has rua nwg tas, “Ua caag koj hu kuv tas tug zoo kawg? Tsw muaj leejtwg zoo tsuas yog Vaajtswv tuab leeg xwb.
Koj paub tej kevcai kws has tas, ‘Tsw xob deev luas quaspuj luas quasyawg, tsw xob tua tuabneeg, tsw xob ua tub saab, tsw xob ua cuav timkhawv, koj yuav tsum fwm koj nam koj txwv.’ ”
Tug hov has tas, “Tej nqai kod kuv tub coj txhua yaam txwj thaus yau lug lawm.”

Thaus Yexu nov le hov txawm has rua nwg tas, “Koj tseed tu ncua ib yaam. Ca le moog muab txhua yaam kws koj muaj muag es muab faib rua cov tuabneeg pluag, koj txhad le muaj nyaj txag sau ntuj ceeb tsheej, hab ca le lug lawv kuv qaab.”
Thaus nwg nov tej lug nuav nwg nyuaj sab kawg vem nwg nplua nuj heev.
Yexu tsaa muag saib nwg hab has tas, “Tug kws muaj nyaj txag ntau ceblaaj nkaag tau rua huv Vaajtswv lub tebchaws.
Ib tug ntxhuav nkaag lub qhov koob kuj yoojyim dua tug nplua nuj nkaag rua huv Vaajtswv lub tebchaws.”
Cov kws nov le hov txawm has tas, “Yog le hov, leejtwg yuav dim tau?”
Yexu has tas, “Tej kws tuabneeg ua tsw tau Vaajtswv yeej ua tau.”
Petu has tas, “Peb tub tso peb tej vaaj tse tseg lawv koj tuaj.”
Yexu has rua puab tas, “Kuv has tseeb rua mej tas, tug kws tso vaaj tse quaspuj kwvtij nam txwv mivnyuas tseg vem yog saib rua Vaajtswv lub tebchaws,
tam nuav nwg yuav tau ntau npaug hab tam peg suab nwg yuav tau txujsa ib txhws tsw kawg.”

Yexu txawm coj kaum ob tug thwjtim moog rua ib caag mas has rua puab tas, “Saib nawj, peb saamswm moog nraag Yeluxalee, mas txhua yaam kws cov xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug has ca txug Tuabneeg leej Tub yuav tav.
Tsua qhov nwg yuav raug muab cob rua lwm haiv tuabneeg, mas puab yuav thuaj luag nwg hab ua saib tsw taug nwg hab ntu qub ncaug rua nwg,
hab puab yuav nplawm nwg hab muab nwg tua pov tseg, mas peb nub nwg yuav caj sawv rov lug.”
Puab tsw nkaag sab txug tej nuav hlo le, tej lug nuav lub ntsab raug muab zais ntawm puab lawm, hab puab tsw paub tas Yexu has txug daabtsw.
Thaus Yexu tuaj ze lub moos Yelikhau, muaj ib tug dig muag nyob tsawg thov khawv ntawm ntug kev.
Thaus nwg nov tuabneeg coob taug kev tuaj moog, nwg txawm nug tas yog daabtsw.
Puab has rua nwg tas, “Yexu kws yog tuabneeg Naxale, taug kev tuaj moog.”
Tes nwg txawm qw has tas, “Yexu kws yog Tavi tug tub 'e, thov khuvleej kuv lauj!”
Cov tuabneeg kws ua ntej txawm txwv nwg kuas nyob tuabywv, los nwg yimfuab qw has tas, “Tavi tug Tub 'e, thov khuvleej kuv lauj!”
Yexu txawm nreg nkaus has kuas coj nwg lug. Thaus nwg lug ze lawm Yexu nug nwg tas,
“Koj xaav kuas kuv ua daabtsw rua koj?” Nwg teb tas, “Tug Tswv, thov pub kuv pum kev.”
Yexu has rua nwg tas, “Ca le pum lauj! Koj txujkev ntseeg ua rua koj zoo hlo.”
Tes taamswm ntawd tug dig muag txawm rov pum kev hab lawv Yexu qaab moog qhuas Vaajtswv. Thaus cov tuabneeg suavdawg pum le hov puab kuj qhuas Vaajtswv.
Yexu moog rua huv lub moos Yelikhau hab yuav hlaa dhau plhawv moog.
Muaj ib tug yawm npe hu ua Xakhai, nwg yog ib tug thawj sau se hab nwg nplua nuj.
Nwg xaav pum tas Yexu yog leejtwg, tassws tuabneeg coob heev nwg txhad saib tsw pum vem nwg qeg taub.
Nwg txhad dha tom hauv ntej nce rua sau ib tsob txwv cua txhad saib pum Yexu, tsua qhov Yexu yuav taug txujkev hov tuaj.
Thaus Yexu tuaj txug ntawd Yexu tsaa muag saib pum Xakhai txawm has rua Xakhai tas, “Xakhai 'e, ca le nqeg kag lug, tsua qhov nub nua kuv yuav tsum moog su huv koj tsev.”
Xakhai txawm maaj nroog nqeg lug tog Yexu zoo sab xyiv faab.
Thaus cov tuabneeg suavdawg pum, puab txawm ywg has tas, “Nwg moog su huv tug tuabneeg muaj txem tsev.”

Xakhai sawv tseeg has rua tug Tswv tas, “Tug Tswv, saib maj, kuv tej hov txhua chaw kuv yuav muab ib nraab pub rua cov tuabneeg pluag, hab yog kuv tau qaum leejtwg le lug, kuv yuav thim plaub npaug rov qaab.”
Yexu has rua nwg tas, “Nub nua txujkev dim lug txug lub tsev nuav lawm, tsua qhov tug yawm nuav kuj yog Aplahaa le tub.
Tsua qhov Tuabneeg leej Tub lug nrhav cov tuabneeg kws pluj lawd hab cawm kuas puab dim.”

Thaus puab saamswm noog Yexu qha tej nuav, Yexu kuj has ib zaaj paaj lug rua puab noog tsua qhov Yexu saamswm tuaj ze lub nroog Yeluxalee, hab vem puab xaav tas Vaajtswv lub tebchaws yuav ca le tshwm plawg lug taamswm ntawd.
Vem le nuav Yexu txhad has tas, “Muaj ib tug tuabneeg muaj meej yuav moog rua lwm lub tebchaws deb moog txais meej mom kaav tebchaws le maav rov lug.
Nwg txhad hu nwg kaum tug tub qhe lug mas muab kaum lub nyaj rua puab ib leeg ib mina  hab has rua puab tas, ‘Ca le coj moog ua laag luam txug thaus kuv rov qaab lug.’
Tassws nwg cov pejxeem ntxub nwg, puab txawm khaiv tuabneeg lawv qaab moog has tas, ‘Peb tsw yuav tug nuav lug kaav peb.’
Thaus nwg tau meej mom kaav tebchaws rov lug lawm nwg has kuas hu cov tub qhe kws nwg tau muab nyaj rua lawd lug cuag nwg, yuav saib puab ua laag luam tau tshaaj thawj npaum le caag.
Thawj tug lug cuag nwg has tas, ‘Tug tswv, koj lub nyaj mina hov tau tshaaj thawj kaum mina.’
Nwg has rua tug tub qhe hov tas, ‘Tub qhe zoo, koj ua zoo lawm. Vem koj ua ncaaj rua tej yaam miv miv, koj yuav tau fwjchim kaav kaum lub moos.’
Tug ob lug has tas, ‘Tug tswv, koj lub mina tau tshaaj thawj tswb mina.’
Nwg has rua tug tub qhe hov tas, ‘Koj yuav tau kaav tswb lub moos.’
Muaj dua ib tug lug has tas, ‘Tug tswv, koj lub nyaj mina nyob nuav, kuv muab ntaub qhwv khaws ca,
tsua qhov kuv ntshai koj vem koj yeej yog tuabneeg ua nruj ua tswv. Koj sau tej kws koj tsw tau nqeg daag zug ua hab hlais tej qoob kws koj tsw tau tseb.’

Tug tswv txawm has rua nwg tas, ‘Nam tub qhe phem, kuv yuav muab koj tej lug txav txem rua koj ntaag. Koj yeej paub tas kuv yog tuabneeg ua nruj ua tswv hab kuv sau tej kws kuv tsw tau nqeg daag zug ua hab hlais tej kws kuv tsw tau tseb lov?
Yog le hov, ua caag koj tsw muab kuv lub nyaj moog tso rua huv tsev ca nyaj, es thaus kuv lug kuv txhad tau kuv cov nyaj hab tau cov paaj?’
Tes nwg txawm has rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob ntawd tas, ‘Ca le muab nwg lub nyaj mina rhu moog rua tug kws muaj kaum mina.’
(Puab has rua nwg tas, ‘Tug tswv, nwg tub muaj kaum mina lawm nev.’)
‘Kuv has rua mej tas, txhua tug kws muaj lawd yuav muab tsaav ntxwv rua nwg, tassws tug kws tsw muaj, txawm yog tej kws nwg muaj los yuav muab rhu ntawm nwg moog.
Kuv cov yeeb ncuab kws tsw yuav kuv kaav puab ntawd, ca le coj puab lug rua ntawm nuav hab muab tua taab meeg kuv.’ ”
Thaus Yexu has tej lug nuav taag lawd, nwg txawm ua puab ntej moog rua nraag Yeluxalee.
Thaus nwg tuaj ze lub zog Npefake hab lub zog Npethani ntawm lub roob kws hu ua roob Txwv Aulib, nwg khaiv ob tug thwjtim moog,

has tas, “Meb ca le moog rua lub zog kws nyob tom hauv ntej, mas thaus meb nkaag rua huv meb yuav pum ib tug mivnyuas neeg luav khi ca, tsw tau muaj leejtwg caij dua le. Meb ca le daws caab lug rua ntawm nuav.
Yog leejtwg nug meb tas, ‘Meb muab daws ua daabtsw?’ meb ca le has le nuav tas, ‘Tug tswv cheem tsum swv.’ ”
Ob tug kws nwg khaiv hov txawm moog ntswb lawv le Yexu has rua ob tug.
Thaus ob tug saamswm daws tug mivnyuas neeg luav hov, tug tswv tsaj txawm has rua ob tug tas, “Meb daws tug mivnyuas neeg luav ua daabtsw?”
Ob tug has tas, “Tug Tswv cheem tsum swv.”
Tes ob tug txawm caab tug mivnyuas neeg luav lug txug Yexu, hab muab ob tug tej tsho ntev pua sau tug mivnyuas neeg luav nraus qaum hab kuas Yexu caij.
Thaus Yexu caij moog mas tej tuabneeg muab puab tej tsho ntev pua txujkev.
Thaus Yexu tuaj ze txujkev kws nqeg ntawm lub roob Txwv Aulib lawm, cov thwjtim suavdawg kuj chiv zoo sab xyiv faab tsaa suab nrov qhuas Vaajtswv rua txhua yaam txujci phemfwj kws puab tau pum,
hab has tas, “Tug vaajntxwv kws tuaj huv tug Tswv lub npe tau nyob kaaj sab lug. Thov kuas muaj kev kaaj sab lug rua sau ntuj hab muaj koob meej rua sau ntuj kws sab kawg nkaus.”
Cov Falixai qee leej kws nrug cov tuabneeg hov ua ke has rua Yexu tas, “Xwbfwb, ca le txwv koj cov thwjtim tsw xob qw qw.”
Yexu teb tas, “Kuv has rua mej tas, yog puab cov nuav nyob tuabywv lawm los tej pob zeb yeej yuav qw nrov.”
Thaus nwg tuaj ze hab pum Yeluxalee lawm nwg kuj quaj lub nroog ntawd,
has tas, “Nub nuav kheev koj laam paub tej kws pub kev kaaj sab lug rua koj. Tassws nwgnuav tej hov raug muab zais ntawm koj lub qhov muag lawm.
Tsua qhov lub swjhawm lug yuav txug koj, mas koj cov yeeb ncuab yuav tsub aav tawm tsaam koj hab vej nkaus koj kaw koj txhua faab.

Puab yuav muab koj ntsawm rua huv peg teb, taag nrho koj hab koj cov mivnyuas kws nyob huv koj, hab yuav tsw tseg tej txhwb zeb ib lub tib ib lub rua huv koj, vem yog koj tsw paub lub swjhawm kws Vaajtswv lug saib koj.”
Yexu txawm nkaag moog rua huv lub tuam tsev mas chiv ntab cov tuabneeg ua laag ua luam,
hab has rua puab tas, “Tub muaj lug sau ca has tas, ‘Kuv lub tuam tsev yuav ua lub tsev thov Vaajtswv,’ tassws mej muab ‘ua qhov rua tub saab nkaum.’ ”
Yexu naj nub qhuab qha rua huv lub tuam tsev. Tes cov pov thawj hlub hab cov xwbfwb qha Vaajtswv kevcai hab cov kws ua thawj txawm nrhav kev txuv Yexu,
tassws puab nrhav tsw tau ib lub ncauj kev kws yuav ua tau vem yog cov tuabneeg suavdawg dai sab quas dhuav rua Yexu tej lug.
Muaj ib nub thaus Yexu qhuab qha cov tuabneeg huv lub tuam tsev hab tshaaj tawm txuj xuv zoo, cov pov thawj hlub hab cov xwbfwb qha Vaajtswv kevcai hab cov kev txwj quas laug kuj tuaj cuag nwg.
Puab has rua Yexu tas, “Ca le has rua peb saib, koj muaj fwjchim daabtsw txhad ua tau tej nuav hab leejtwg muab tug fwjchim nuav rua koj?”
Yexu teb puab tas, “Kuv yuav nug mej ib lus hab. Qha kuv saib,
txuj kevcai raus dej kws Yauhaa ua hov, lug sau ntuj lug los lug ntawm tuabneeg lug?”
Puab txawm sablaaj has tas, “Yog peb has tas, ‘Lug sau ntuj lug,’ nwg yuav has tas, ‘Ua caag mej tsw ntseeg Yauhaa?’
Tassws yog peb has tas, ‘Lug ntawm tuabneeg lug,’ cov pejxeem suavdawg yuav xuas pob zeb ntaus peb tsua qhov puab yeej fwm tas Yauhaa yog ib tug xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug.”
Puab txawm teb Yexu tas puab tsw paub tas lug hovtwg lug.
Yexu txhad has rua puab tas, “Kuv kuj tsw qha rua mej tas kuv muaj fwjchim daabtsw txhad ua tau tej nuav.”
Yexu txawm chiv ua pev lug has rua cov tuabneeg tas, “Muaj ib tug yawm cog tau ib lub vaaj txwv maab hab muab tso rua ib cov tu faib txwv tes txawm moog nyob lwm tebchaws ntev lawm.

Thaus txug lub caij de txwv, nwg khaiv ib tug tub qhe moog cuag cov kws tu lub vaaj hov sub puab txhad faib cov txwv ib txha rua tug tswv. Tassws cov kws tu lub vaaj txawm muab tug tub qhe hov ntaus hab lawv nwg rov moog teg dawb teg do.
Mas tug tswv vaaj rov tso dua ib tug tub qhe moog, los puab kuj muab tug hov ntaus hab ua saib tsw taug nwg, hab tso nwg rov moog teg dawb teg do.
Nwg kuj tso tug peb moog, los puab kuj ua rua nwg raug mob hab muab nwg ntab tawm moog.
Tug tswv vaaj txawm has tas, ‘Kuv yuav ua le caag? Kuv yuav tso kuv tug tub kws kuv hlub moog. Nyab puab yuav fwm nwg.’
Tassws thaus cov kws tu lub vaaj pum tug tub hov puab sws has tas, ‘Tug nuav yog tug kws saws nwg qub txeeg qub teg. Peb ca le muab nwg tua mas tej qub txeeg qub teg yuav poob rua peb.’
Puab txawm muab nwg nrum rua nrau lub vaaj hab muab tua pov tseg. Yog le ntawd tug tswv vaaj yuav ua le caag rua puab?
Nwg yeej yuav lug muab cov kws tu lub vaaj hov ua kuas puam tsuaj hab muab lub vaaj txwv maab rua lwm cov tu.” Thaus puab nov le hov puab txawm has tas, “Tsw xob ca muaj le nuav.”

Yexu saib ntsoov rua puab has tas, “Tej lug nuav kws sau ca lawd lub ntsab yog daabtsw? “ ‘Lub pob zeb kws cov Kws ua tsev muab xyeeb tseg lawm tub muab lug teeb ua lub thawj rua ntawm kaum tsev lawm.’
Txhua tug kws qaug moog tsam lub pob zeb hov yuav tawg ua tej dwb daim, lub pob zeb poob lug tsuam leejtwg tug hov yuav ntsoog taag.”
Cov xwbfwb qha Vaajtswv kevcai hab cov pov thawj hlub txawm nrhav kev nteg Yexu lub swjhawm ntawd, tsua qhov puab paub tas Yexu has zaaj paaj lug nuav raug puab, tassws puab ntshai cov pejxeem.
Puab txawm soj nraim Yexu hab tso qee leej ua txuj ua le tug ncaaj nceeg moog tshuaj Yexu sub puab txhad nyaag tau Yexu tej lug hab muab tau Yexu cob rua huv tug tswv xeev le fwjchim txav txem.
Puab txawm nug Yexu tas, “Xwbfwb, peb paub tas koj has hab qhuab qha lawv le qhov tseeb, hab koj tsw saib leejtwg ntsej muag, koj tsuas qha Vaajtswv txuj kev lawv le muaj tseeb xwb.
Mas tswm nyog peb them se rua Xixa los tsw them?”
Yexu tub paub puab tej tswvyim phem txhad has rua puab tas,
“Ca le muab ib lub nyaj ntenalia  lug rua kuv saib. Lub ntsej muag hab lub npe kws txaug nuav yog leejtwg?” Puab teb tas, “Yog Xixa le.”
Yexu txawm has rua puab tas, “Yog le nuav yaam kws yog Xixa le ca le muab rua Xixa, yaam kws yog Vaajtswv le ca le muab rua Vaajtswv.”
Puab nyaag tsw tau Yexu tej lug taab meeg cov pejxeem, puab xaav tsw thoob rua tej lug kws Yexu teb, puab txhad ntsag tu lawm.
Cov Xantukai qee leej kws qha has tas tsw muaj qhov kws sawv huv qhov tuag lug txawm tuaj cuag Yexu,

mas puab txhad thom Yexu has tas, “Xwbfwb, Mauxe tub sau ca rua peb tas, ‘Yog leejtwg tuag lawm nwg tug quaspuj tsw tau muaj mivnyuas, ib tug kwvtij yuav tsum yuav tug quaspuj hov txhad rhawv tau tug kws tuag le keeb kwm ca.’
Muaj xyaa tug kwvtij. Tug hlub yuav quaspuj lawm le tuag tsw tau muaj mivnyuas.
Mas tug ob
hab tug peb kuj yuav tug puj hov ua quaspuj. Taag nrho xyaa leej kuj yuav nwg ib yaam nkaus los tsw muaj mivnyuas txawm tuag taag lawm.
Thaus kawg tug quaspuj hov kuj tuag lawm hab.
Yog le ntawd, nub kws caj sawv rov lug, tug puj hov yuav ua leejtwg le quaspuj? Tsua qhov nwg tub ua xyaa leej hov le quaspuj lawm.”
Yexu has rua puab tas, “Tam tuabneeg nuav muaj kev sws yuav ua quaspuj quasyawg,
tassws cov tuabneeg kws suav tas tswm nyog nyob rua tam peg suab hab caj sawv huv qhov tuag rov lug yuav tsw muaj kev sws yuav ua quaspuj quasyawg lawm,
tsua qhov puab tsw txawj tuag dua le lawm. Puab zoo ib yaam le cov tubkhai ntuj hab yog Vaajtswv cov mivnyuas, vem puab yog cov kws caj sawv rov lug lawm.

Qhov kws tuabneeg caj sawv huv qhov tuag rov lug hov, Mauxe tub qha rua huv zaaj kws has txug tsob ntoo kub nyab, yog qhov chaw kws nwg hu tug Tswv tas yog Aplahaa tug Vaajtswv hab yog Yiha tug Vaajtswv hab yog Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv.
Vaajtswv tsw yog cov tuabneeg tuag tug Vaajtswv, nwg yog cov tuabneeg caj tug Vaajtswv. Tsua qhov txhua tug puavleej tseed muaj txujsa nyob rua ntawm Vaajtswv.”
Cov xwbfwb qha Vaajtswv kevcai qee leej txawm has rua Yexu tas, “Xwbfwb, koj has tau zoo kawg.”
Puab tsw kaav nug Yexu dua le lawm.
Yexu txawm nug puab tas, “Puab has tau le caag tas tug Kheto yog Tavi le tub?
Tsua qhov Tavi yeej has huv phoo Ntawv Nkauj has tas, “ ‘Tug Tswv has rua kuv tug tswv tas, “Ca le nyob tsawg ntawm kuv saab xws,
moog txug thaus kuv muab koj cov yeeb ncuab ua koj lub rooj tag taw.” ’
Yog Tavi tub hu tug Kheto tas ‘tug Tswv,’ nwg yuav ua le caag ua tau Tavi le tub?”
Thaus cov tuabneeg suavdawg saamswm noog tej lug qha, Yexu has rua nwg cov thwjtim tas,

“Ca le ceev faaj cov xwbfwb qha Vaajtswv kevcai kws nyam naav lub tsho ntev moog moog lug lug hab nyam kuas luas fwm puab tom tej tshaav puam, hab nyam nyob tej rooj sab huv tej tsev sablaaj, hab thaus muaj rooj noj rooj haus puab nyam nyob saam tsum.
Puab txeeb cov puj ntsuag tej vaaj tse hab thov Vaajtswv ntev ntev rua luas pum. Puab cov nuav yimfuab yuav raug txem nyaav heev dua.”
Yexu tsaa muag saib pum cov tuabneeg nplua nuj tso nyaj rua huv lub swb xaab xyeem nyaj,
hab nwg pum ib tug puj ntsuag pluag pluag tso ob lub txaj toog lab rua huv.
Yexu txawm has tas, “Kuv has tseeb rua mej tas, tug puj ntsuag pluag nuav tso nyaj rua huv ntau dua txhua tug.

Tsua qhov puab txhua tug rhu tej nyaj kws puab muaj ntau nplua mag lawm mivntswv tuaj tso rua huv tassws tug puj nuav lub neej txom nyem kawg le los nwg muab txhua yaam kws yug nwg txujsa tso rua huv.”
Thaus muaj qee leej qhuas lub tuam tsev tas xuas tej txhwb zeb zoo nkauj ua hab xuas tej kws luas coj tuaj xyeem pub ua kuas zoo nkauj, Yexu txawm has tas,
“Tej kws mej pum nuav, mas muaj ib nub twg tej txhwb zeb kws tib ib lub tshooj ib lub nuav yuav tsw tshuav ib lub kws tsw raug muab ua pob taag.”
Puab txawm nug Yexu tas, “Xwbfwb, tej xwm txheej nuav yuav tshwm lug thaus twg, hab muaj yaam txujci twg qha kuas paub tas tub ze swjhawm kws yuav tshwm lug?”

Yexu has tas, “Ca le ceev faaj tuab zoo tsaam tes mej raug ntxag yuam kev. Tsua qhov yuav muaj ntau leej tuav kuv lub npe lug has tas, ‘Kuv yog tug hov ntaag,’ hab has tas, ‘Lub swjhawm lug ze lawm.’ Tsw xob lawv puab moog.
Thaus mej nov suab ua tsuv ua rog hab kev kub ntxhuv tsw xob ntshai, tsua qhov tej nuav yeej yuav tsum tshwm lug ua ntej tassws nub kawg tsw tau lug txug taamswm.”
Yexu txawm has rua puab tas, “Ib lub tebchaws yuav sawv tawm tsaam rua ib lub tebchaws, ib tug vaajntxwv yuav tawm tsaam rua ib tug vaajntxwv,
yuav muaj ntuj qeg luj hab yuav muaj kev tshaib kev nqhes hab mob kis rua ntau qhov, hab yuav muaj tej xwm txheej txaus ntshai hab tej txujci tseem ceeb lug sau ntuj lug.

Tassws thaus tsw tau muaj tej xwm txheej nuav luas yuav nteg mej hab tswm txom mej, muab mej cob rua tej tsev sablaaj hab tej tsev lojfaaj, hab yuav coj mej moog rua ntawm tej vaajntxwv hab cov thawj kaav xubndag vem yog tim kuv lub npe.
Lub swjhawm ntawd yog lub swjhawm kws mej ua tau timkhawv.
Yog le nuav, mej yuav tsum ncu ntsoov tas tsw txug yuav npaaj ua ntej tas yuav has le caag daws mej zaaj,
tsua qhov kuv yuav pub tej lug hab tswvyim rua mej has kws mej cov yeeb ncuab yuav tiv tsw tau hab caav tsw yeej.
“Txawm yog nam txwv kwvtij tej txheeb ze hab kwvluag los puab yuav muab mej cob rua luas, mas luas yuav muab mej qee leej tua pov tseg.
Ib tsoom tuabneeg yuav ntxub mej vem yog tim kuv lub npe,
los mej ib txuj plaubhau yuav tsw puam tsuaj.
Mej yuav tau txujsa vem mej ua sab ntev thev.
“Thaus mej pum tub rog vej nkaus lub nroog Yeluxalee, ca le paub tas ze lub swjhawm kws lub nroog yuav puam tsuaj taag nyob do cuas.
Thaus hov cov kws nyob huv Yutia ca le tswv moog rua peg tej roob, hab cov kws nyob huv lub nroog ca le tawm tswv moog, hab cov kws nyob tom teb tsw xob rov lug rua huv nroog.
tsua qhov lub swjhawm ntawd yog nub kws teem txem sub txhua yaam kws sau ca lawd txhad le tav.

Nub ntawd cov kws suab mivnyuas hab cov kws muaj mivnyuas noj mig yuav txom nyem kawg le lauj! Vem tas yuav muaj kev txom nyem luj kawg rua lub nplajteb hab txujkev npau tawg yuav raug haiv tuabneeg nuav.

Puab yuav raug nav ntaaj nav rag tuag taag hab yuav raug muab nteg coj moog rua huv txhua lub tebchaws. Hab lwm haiv tuabneeg yuav tsuj lub nroog Yeluxalee moog txug thaus lwm haiv tuabneeg lub swjhawm tav.

“Yuav muaj txujci tseem ceeb tshwm rua sau lub nub lub hli hab tej nub qub huvsw, hab ib tsoom tebchaws huv nplajteb nuav yuav raug kev txom nyem hab yuav tsw pum qaab xaav vem lub suab nrov kws dej havtxwv ndaas tej nam nthwv.
Tej tuabneeg yuav feeb pis tsag vem ntshai heev hab tog ntsoov tej kws yuav tswm lug raug lub nplajteb, tsua qhov tej kws muaj fwjchim sau nruab ntug yuav raug muab cu ua zug quas kais.
Thaus ntawd puab yuav pum Tuabneeg leej Tub nrug nwg tug fwjchim hab meej mom luj nrug fuab sau ntuj lug.
Thaus tej xwm txheej nuav chiv muaj tshwm lug, ca le sawv ntsug hab tsaa taubhau, vem qhov kws txhwv mej dim lug ze lawm.”
Yexu ua paaj lug has rua puab tas, “Ca le saib tsob ntoo cua hab tej ntoo huvsw.
Thaus chiv hlaav nplooj, mej kuj pum hab paub tas yuav txug lub caij ntuj kub lawm.
Ib yaam le ntawd, thaus mej pum tej xwm txheej nuav tshwm lug mej kuj paub tas Vaajtswv lub tebchaws lug ze lawm.
Kuv has tseeb rua mej tas, tam tuabneeg nuav yuav tsw tau dua taag moog txug thaus txhua yaam nuav tshwm lug lawm.
Lub ntuj hab lub nplajteb yuav dua moog, tassws kuv tej lug yuav tsw pluj hlo le.

“Yuav tsum ceev faaj zoo tsaam tes mej lub sab qaug rua tej kev tsw tsheej haaj, kev qaug dej qaug cawv hab tej kev txhawj txug lub neej tam nuav tes nub ntawd yuav lug txug mej rua thaus mej xaav tsw txug,
ib yaam le maag rooj hlua. Tsua qhov nub ntawd yuav lug raug txhua tug kws nyob thoob plawg huv lub nplajteb.
Mej yuav tsum zuv tog txhua lub swjhawm, hab thov Vaajtswv paab kuas mej muaj zug dim txhua yaam xwm txheej kws yuav tshwm lug nuav hab sawv ntsug tau rua ntawm Tuabneeg leej Tub xubndag.”
Yexu naj nub qhuab qha huv lub tuam tsev, mas tsaus ntuj nwg tawm moog su sau lub roob kws hu ua roob Txwv Aulib.
Thaus sawv ntxuv cov tuabneeg suavdawg tuaj cuag nwg huv lub tuam tsev noog nwg qha.
Kevcai Noj Ncuav tsw Xyaw Keeb kws hu ua kevcai Hlaa Dhau tub lug yuav txug.
Cov pov thawj hlub hab cov xwbfwb qha Vaajtswv kevcai nrhav kev saib yuav muab Yexu tua pov tseg le caag, vem puab ntshai cov pejxeem.
Thaus ntawd Xataa  tshoov Yutas kws hu tas Ikhali‑au kws yog ib tug huv kaum ob tug thwjtim lub sab.
Yutas txawm moog nrug cov pov thawj hlub hab cov num tswv kws saib lub tuam tsev sablaaj tas yuav muab Yexu cob rua puab le caag.
Puab zoo sab heev hab cog lug tas yuav muab nyaj rua Yutas.
Nwg txawm has hum hab nrhav swjhawm muab Yexu cob rua puab, rua thaus tsw muaj tuabneeg.
Thaus txug nub kws ua kevcai Noj Ncuav tsw Xyaw Keeb yog nub kws yuav tsum tua mivnyuas yaaj ua kevcai Hlaa Dhau.
Yexu txawm khaiv Petu hab Yauhaa moog has tas, “Ca le moog npaaj kevcai Hlaa Dhau rua peb noj.”
Ob tug has rua Yexu tas, “Yuav ca ib npaaj noj rua hovtwg?”
Nwg has rua ob tug tas, “Thaus meb moog rua huv lub nroog, mas yuav muaj ib tug yawm nqaa ib lub laujkaub dej ntswb meb. Nwg nkaag rua lub tsev twg, meb ca le lawv nwg qaab moog rua huv,
hab has rua tug tswv tsev hov tas, ‘Tug xwbfwb has rua koj tas, Chaav txais qhua kws kuv yuav nrug kuv cov thwjtim noj kevcai Hlaa Dhau nyob hovtwg?’
Nwg yuav qha ib chaav luj kws nyob txheej sau muaj rooj tog txhwj lawm. Ca le npaaj hov ntawd.”
Ob tug txawm moog hab ntswb lawv le Yexu has rua ob tug, tes ob tug txhad npaaj ua kevcai Hlaa Dhau txhwj zog.
Thaus txug swjhawm, Yexu nrug nwg cov tubkhai nyob pheeb ntawm rooj mov,
hab has rua puab tas, “Kuv xaav xaav nrug mej noj pluag mov kevcai Hlaa Dhau nuav ua ntej kws kuv tsw tau raug tswm txom,
tsua qhov kuv has rua mej tas, kuv yuav tsw noj le nuav moog txug thaus kevcai Hlaa Dhau tav rua huv Vaajtswv lub tebchaws.”
Hab nwg muab ib lub khob lug. Thaus ua Vaajtswv tsaug lawd, nwg has tas, “Ca le txais lub khob nuav moog sws faib haus,
tsua qhov kuv has rua mej tas txwj nwgnuav moog kuv yuav tsw haus cawv txwv maab moog txug thaus Vaajtswv lub tebchaws lug.”
Hab nwg muab ib lub ncuav lug. Thaus ua Vaajtswv tsaug lawd, nwg muab ndais cev rua puab has tas, “Nuav yog kuv lub cev kws muab pub rua mej. Ca le ua le nuav txhad ncu ntsoov kuv.”
Thaus noj mo taag, Yexu txawm muab lub khob lug ua ib yaam nkaus has tas, “Lub khob kws raug muab nchuav rua mej nuav yog lu lug cog tseg tshab huv kuv cov ntshaav.
Tug kws yuav faav xeeb rua kuv txhais teg kuj nrug kuv koom sau rooj nuav.
Tuabneeg leej Tub yuav moog lawv le kws teem tseg ca lawd tassws tug kws faav xeeb rua nwg yeej yuav raug txom nyem kawg.”
Tes puab txawm sws nug saib puab cov leejtwg yog tug yuav ua le ntawd.
Cov thwjtim sws caam tas yuav pum tas puab cov leejtwg yog tug luj dua.
Yexu txawm has rua puab tas, “Lwm haiv tuabneeg tej vaajntxwv yeej kaav rawv cov pejxeem, hab cov kws muaj fwjchim kaav rov hu puab tug kheej tas yog tuabneeg sab daav paab luas.
Tassws mej cov tsw thooj le ntawd. Mej cov tug kws ua luj dua ndais ca le ua zoo le tug miv dua ndais, hab tug kws ua thawj ca le ua zoo le tug qhev.
Leejtwg luj dua, yog tug kws nyob tsawg noj lossws yog tug kws ua qhev? Yog tug kws nyob tsawg noj los tsw yog? Tassws kuv nrug mej nyob zoo le tug kws ua qhev.
“Mej yog cov kws nrug nraim kuv nyob rua thaus kuv raug swm sab txom nyem,
mas kuv npaaj ib lub tebchaws rua mej ib yaam le kuv Txwv npaaj rua kuv lawm,
sub mej txhad tau noj tau haus ntawm kuv lub rooj huv kuv lub tebchaws, hab mej yuav tau nyob quas tsawg sau tej zwm txwv txav txem rua kaum ob xeem Yixayee.
“Ximoo, Ximoo 'e, saib maj, Xataa  tub thov mej lawm yuav muab mej tshau ib yaam le tshau mog,
tassws kuv tub thov Vaajtswv paab kuas koj kev ntseeg tsw xob tu. Mas thaus koj tig rov lug lawd, koj ca le txhawb koj cov kwvtij tug zug.”
Petu has rua Yexu tas, “Tug Tswv, kuv yeej npaaj txhwj yuav nrug koj raug kaw huv tsev lojfaaj hab nrug koj tuag ua ke.”
Yexu has tas, “Petu 'e, kuv has rua koj tas, nub nua thaus qab tsw tau qua koj yuav tsw leeg paub kuv txug peb zag.”
Yexu has rua puab tas, “Thaus kuv khaiv mej tawm moog es tsw muaj naas nyaj hab naab thoob puab hab khau mej tu ncua daabtsw?” Puab teb tas, “Tsw tu ncua daabtsw.”
Yexu txawm has rua puab tas, “Nwgnuav leejtwg muaj naas nyaj kuj ca le coj moog, hab coj naab thoob puab ib yaam nkaus. Tug kws tsw muaj ntaaj kuj ca le muab nwg lub tsho ntev muag moog yuav ntaaj.
Kuv has rua mej tas tej lug kws muab sau ca lawd yuav tsum tav rua huv kuv, kws has tas, ‘Nwg raug muab suav rua huv cov tuabneeg muaj txem.’  Tej kws muab sau tseg has txug kuv saamswm tav.”
Puab txawm has tas, “Tug Tswv, ntawm nuav muaj ob raab ntaaj.” Yexu has rua puab tas, “Txaus lauj!”
Yexu txawm tawm moog peg lub roob Txwv Aulib ib yaam le txeev moog, nwg cov thwjtim kuj lawv nwg qaab moog.
Thaus nwg moog txug lawm, Yexu has rua puab tas, “Mej ca le thov Vaajtswv sub txhad tsw raug kev swm sab.”
Yexu txawm ncaim puab moog deb le laim ib cos zeb, mas nwg txhus caug thov Vaajtswv has tas,
“Au leej Txwv, yog koj pum zoo, thov rhu lub khob nuav ntawm kuv moog. Txawm le caag kuj xwj, tsw xob ua lawv le kuv lub sab, ca ua lawv le koj lub sab.”
[Muaj ib tug tubkhai ntuj lug tshwm rua Yexu hab txhawb nwg tug zug.
Yexu txhawj heev kawg le, nwg yimfuab thov Vaajtswv heev, nwg nto fws zoo yaam nkaus le ntshaav nrug tej teev rua huv aav.]
Thaus Yexu thov taag nwg sawv lug rua ntawm cov thwjtim, pum puab tsaug zug ua txhawj quas ntsuav,
nwg txawm has rua puab tas, “Mej tsaug zug ua daabtsw? Ca le sawv tseeg thov Vaajtswv, sub mej txhad tsw raug kev swm sab.”
Thaus Yexu tseed saamswm has lug, txawm muaj ib paab tuabneeg coob tuaj, hab tug yawm kws hu ua Yutas kws yog ib tug huv kaum ob tug thwjtim coj puab tuaj. Yutas txaav lug ze yuav nwj Yexu,
tassws Yexu has rua nwg tas, “Yutas 'e, koj yuav nwj faav xeeb rua Tuabneeg leej Tub lov?”
Thaus cov kws nrug Yexu pum tas yuav tshwm xwm, puab txawm has tas, “Tug Tswv, peb xuas ntaaj tiv lov?”
Muaj ib tug txawm tuab ntaug tug tuam pov thawj hlub tug tub qhe txav nwg saab nplooj ntseg xws tu nrho.
Yexu has tas, “Ca le lauj!” Tes Yexu txawm cev teg npuab tug hov lub qhov ntsej khu kuas zoo hlo.

Yexu txawm has rua cov pov thawj hlub hab cov thawj rog kws saib lub tuam tsev hab cov kev txwj quas laug kws tawm tuaj nteg nwg has tas, “Mej coj ntaaj coj qws tuaj nteg kuv ib yaam le tawm moog nteg tub saab lov?
Thaus kuv naj nub nrug mej nyob huv lub tuam tsev, mej tsua tsw cev teg nteg kuv. Tassws nuav yog mej le swjhawm hab yog tug fwjchim tsaus ntuj le swjhawm.”
Puab txawm nteg Yexu coj moog rua huv tug tuam pov thawj hlub lub tsev. Petu lawv Yexu qaab deb deb moog.
Thaus puab rauv tawg nte huv plawv lub tshaav puam ntawm lub tsev hab nyob tsawg lawm, Petu kuj nrug puab nyob tsawg ua ke.
Muaj ib tug nkauj qhev pum Petu nyob tsawg ntawm cov duab suavtawg laam lug, txawm saib ntsoov rua hab has tas, “Tug nuav tub nrug Yexu ua ke hab.”
Tassws Petu tsw leeg, nwg has tas, “Tug muam 'e, kuv tsw paub tug hov hlo le.”
Dhau ntawd ib ntswv muaj dua ib tug pum Petu txawm has tas, “Koj yeej yog puab cov ib tug hab.” Petu has tas, “Txwv ntxawm 'e, kuv tsw yog.”
Dhau ntawd kwvlaam ib teev, muaj dua ib tug has tawv tawv tas, “Tug nuav yeej nrug Yexu ua ke tag tag le, vem nwg tub yog tuabneeg Kalilai.”
Petu has tas, “Txwv ntxawm 'e, kuv yeej tsw paub tej kws koj has kod.” Thaus Petu tseed saamswm has le ntawd qab txawm qua taamswm.
Tug Tswv txawm tig lug saib Petu, mas Petu ncu dheev txug tej lug kws tug Tswv tau has rua nwg tas, “Nub nua thaus qab tsw tau qua koj yuav tsw leeg paub kuv peb zag.”
Petu txawm tawm moog rua saab nrau quaj nyuaj sab heev.
Cov kws nteg Yexu kuj thuaj luag hab ntaus Yexu.
Puab muab ntaub qhwv Yexu qhov muag nug nwg tas, “Ca le cev Vaajtswv lug. Saib leejtwg ntaus koj?”
Hab puab tseed has ntau yaam tuam mom Yexu.
Thaus kaaj ntug cov kev txwj quas laug huv cov pejxeem hab cov pov thawj hlub hab cov xwbfwb qha Vaajtswv kevcai tuaj txoos ua ke. Puab coj Yexu moog rua huv puab lub chaw sablaaj.  hab has tas,
“Yog koj yog tug Kheto kuj ca le has rua peb.” Tassws Yexu has rua puab tas, “Txawm yog kuv has rua mej los mej yuav tsw ntseeg.
hab yog kuv nug los mej yuav tsw teb.
Tassws txwj nuav moog Tuabneeg leej Tub yuav nyob tsawg ntawm Vaajtswv kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg saab xws.”
Puab txhua tug txawm has tas, “Yog le ntawd, koj yog Vaajtswv tug Tub lov?” Yexu has rua puab tas, “Mej has tas kuv yog.”
Puab txawm has tas, “Peb tseed yuav dua timkhawv le caag? Peb tub nov nwg lub qhov ncauj has ntaag.”
Puab suavdawg txawm sawv tseeg coj Yexu moog cuag Philaj.
Puab chiv kom Yexu has tas, “Peb pum tug nuav saamswm ntxeev peb lub tebchaws. Nwg txwv kuas peb tsw xob them se rua Xixa hab has tas nwg yog tug Kheto, yog ib tug vaajntxwv.”
Philaj txawm nug Yexu tas, “Koj yog cov Yutai tug vaajntxwv lov?” Yexu has tas, “Yog le koj has.”
Philaj txawm has rua cov pov thawj hlub hab cov tuabneeg hov tas, “Kuv tsw pum tug nuav muaj ib qho txhum hlo le.”
Tassws puab has tawv qhawv tas, “Tug nuav tshaum cov pejxeem hab qhuab qha thoob plawg Yutia txwj ntawm Kalilai lug txug ntawm nuav.”
Thaus Philaj nov le ntawd, nwg txawm nug tas tug hov yog tuabneeg Kalilai lov?
Thaus nwg paub tas Yexu nyob huv Helauj le kaav xyuam, nwg txawm xaa Yexu moog cuag Helauj kws tseed nyob huv Yeluxalee rua lub swjhawm ntawd.
Thaus Helauj pum Yexu nwg kuj zoo sab heev tsua qhov nwg tub xaav pum Yexu ntev lug lawm tsua qhov nwg tub nov txug Yexu, hab nwg vaam tas yuav pum Yexu ua ib yaam txujci tseem ceeb.
Nwg txawm nug Yexu ntau qhov tassws Yexu tsw teb le.
Cov pov thawj hlub hab cov xwbfwb qha Vaajtswv kevcai kuj sawv ntawd swv zug kom Yexu heev kawg.
Helauj hab nwg cov tub rog kuj saib tsw taug thuaj luag Yexu. Thaus muab ib cev tsoog zoo nkauj ua rua Yexu naav, Helauj txawm xaa Yexu rov moog rua Philaj.
Helauj hab Philaj txawm sws raug zoo rua nub ntawd, tsua qhov yaav taag lug ob tug ua yeeb ncuab.
Philaj txawm hu cov pov thawj hlub hab cov thawj hab cov pejxeem tuaj txoos ua ke,
hab has rua puab tas, “Mej coj tug nuav tuaj cuag kuv has tas nwg tshaum cov pejxeem kuas faav xeeb. Kuv tub tshuaj saib nwg taab meeg mej los kuv tsw pum tas nwg muaj kev txhum lawv le mej kom nwg,
hab Helauj kuj tsw pum nwg muaj kev txhum tsua qhov Helauj tub xaa nwg rov lug cuag kuv. Saib maj, tug nuav yeej tsw muaj ib qhov txhum kws tswm nyog muab rau txem tuag.
Vem le nuav kuv yuav muab nwg nplawm hab tso nwg dim.”
Tassws cov tuabneeg ib txhwj qw has tas, “Muab tug nuav tua pov tseg, es tso Npalanpa rua peb.”
Npalanpa yeej raug kaw huv tsev lojfaaj vem yog tshaum tuabneeg faav xeeb huv lub nroog hab tua tuabneeg.
Philaj tseed xaav tso Yexu dim txhad has rua puab dua ib zag,
tassws puab qw nrov has tas, “Muab nwg teem, muab nwg teem rua sau khaublig ntoo.”
Philaj has rua puab zag peb tas, “Ua caag muab teem? Nwg tau ua txhum daabtsw? Kuv tsw pum nwg ua txhum daabtsw kws yuav tswm nyog tuag. Vem le nuav kuv yuav muab nwg nplawm hab tso nwg moog.”
Tassws puab qw nrov nrov txhwb kuas muab Yexu teem rua sau khaublig ntoo, tes puab lub suab txawm kov yeej.
Philaj txhad txav txem lawv le puab thov.
Nwg txhad tso tug kws puab thov hov yog tug raug kaw huv tsev lojfaaj vem yog tshaum tuabneeg faav xeeb hab tua tuabneeg. Hab nwg muab Yexu cob rua puab ua lawv le puab lub sab.
Thaus puab saamswm coj Yexu moog, puab yuam Ximoo kws yog tuabneeg Khulene taug kev peg yaaj saab tuaj. Puab txawm muab tug khaublig ntoo rua nwg kwv lawv Yexu qaab moog.
Muaj tuabneeg coob coob hab ib co quaspuj kws ntaus hauv sab quaj ntsuag lawv Yexu qaab moog.
Yexu tig lug saib puab hab has tas, “Yeluxalee cov ntxhais 'e, tsw xob quaj kuv, ca le quaj mej tug kheej hab mej cov mivnyuas nawj.
Tsua qhov yuav txug lub swjhawm kws luas yuav has tas, ‘Cov quaspuj mooj hab lub plaab kws tsw tau xeeb dua mivnyuas hab tej txwv mig kws mivnyuas tsw tau ntxais dua tau nyob kaaj sab lug.’
Lub swjhawm ntawd puab yuav chiv hu rua tej roob tas, ‘Ca le nphau lug tsuam peb,’ hab hu rua tej pov roob tas, ‘ Ca le txhub hlo peb.’
Thaus tsob ntoo nyoog, puab tub ua le nuav, tes thaus tsob ntoo qhuav lawm puab tseed yuav ua le caag?”
Puab kuj coj dua ob tug yawm tuabneeg phem moog tua pov tseg nrug Yexu ua ke.

Thaus puab moog txug lub chaw kws hu tas roob Txhaa Taubhau, puab txawm muab Yexu teem rua sau khaublig ntoo rua hov ntawd, hab muab ob tug tuabneeg phem hov teem nrug Yexu, saab xws ib tug saab phem ib tug.
Yexu has tas, “Au kuv txwv, thov daws puab lub txem, vem puab tsw paub tas puab ua daabtsw.” Puab muab nwg cev tsoog tsho lug rhu ntawv faib rua puab.

Cov tuabneeg kuj sawv ntawd saib ntsoov. Cov thawj kuj thuaj luag Yexu has tas, “Nwg cawm tau luas dim, yog nwg yog Vaajtswv tug Kheto kws Vaajtswv xaiv ca lawd, kuj ca nwg cawm nwg tug kheej dim los maj!”
Cov tub rog kuj thuaj luag nwg, hab tuaj muab cov kua qaub  cev rua nwg haus,
hab has tas, “Yog koj yog cov Yutai tug vaajntxwv, ca le cawm koj tug kheej dim los maj!”
Ntawm Yexu lawm sau muaj ib co lug sau ca has tas, “Tug nuav yog cov Yutai tug vaajntxwv.”
Ib tug kws raug teem rua sau khaublig ntoo ntawd, kuj has tuam mom Yexu tas, “Koj yog tug Kheto los tsw yog? Ca le cawm koj hab ib ob leeg dim los maj!”
Tassws muaj dua ib tug txwv nwg has tas, “Koj tsw ntshai Vaajtswv lov? Koj tub raug txem ib yaam nkaus hab.
Ib ob leeg yeej raug txem lawv le txujcai, vem ib tau saws lawv le ib tau ua lug lawm, tassws tug nuav tsw tau ua ib qho txhum hlo le.”
Tes nwg txawm has tas, “Yexu, thaus koj nkaag rua huv koj lub tebchaws thov koj ncu txug kuv.”
Yexu has rua nwg tas, “Kuv has tseeb rua koj tas, nub nua koj yeej yuav tau nrug kuv nyob huv lub chaw zoo kawg nkaus.”
Thaus ntawd kwvlaam taav su txawm tsaus ntuj ndais thoob plawg lub tebchaws moog txug nub qaij peb teev.
Lub nub kuj tsaus nti, daim ntaub kws thaiv huv lub tuam tsev txawm nduag rhe ua ob daim.
Yexu txawm tsaa suab qw nrov has tas, “Kuv txwv, kuv muab kuv tug ntsuj plig cob rua huv koj txhais teg.” Yexu has le ntawd taag nwg txawm tu sav nrho.
Thaus tug thawj rog kws kaav ib puas leej pum tej kws tshwm lug nuav, nwg txawm qhuas Vaajtswv has tas, “Tseeb tag lauj, tug nuav yeej yog ib tug ncaaj nceeg.”
Cov tuabneeg coob kws tuaj saib tej xwm txheej nuav thaus pum lawd kuj ntaus hauv sab rov qaab moog tsev.
Txhua tug kws paub Yexu hab cov quaspuj kws nrug Yexu tuaj peg Kalilai tuaj kuj sawv deb deb saib tej xwm txheej nuav.
Muaj ib tug yawm npe hu ua Yauxej kws nyob huv cov Yutai lub moos Alimathia yog ib tug huv cov thawj lub rooj sablaaj, nwg yog ib tug tuabneeg zoo hab ncaaj nceeg.
Nwg tsw pum zoo qhov kws puab tau has hum hab puab ua le ntawd, hab nwg tog rawv Vaajtswv lub tebchaws.
Yauxej txawm moog cuag Philaj thov Yexu lub cev tuag.
Thaus Yauxej txu Yexu lub cev tuag lug lawd nwg muab ib daim ntaub maag qhwv, coj moog tso rua huv lub qhov ntxaa kws txaug ca rua huv phaab zeb, kws tsw tau log tuag le.
Nub ntawd yog nub kws npaaj rua nub Xanpatau kws tub yuav txug.
Cov quaspuj kws nrug Yexu tuaj peg Kalilai tuaj kuj lawv qaab moog pum lub qhov ntxaa hov hab pum tas puab muab Yexu lub cev tuag tso le caag.
Tes cov quaspuj hov txawm rov qaab moog npaaj tshuaj tsw qaab hab roj tsw qaab. Nub Xanpatau puab txawm su lawv le kevcai.
Nub ib  thaus sawv ntxuv tsw tau kaaj ntug cov quaspuj coj tej tshuaj tsw qaab kws puab npaaj lawd moog txug lub qhov ntxaa.
Puab pum daim laag zeb tub muab dov tawm ntawm rooj ntxaa lawm.
Thaus puab nkaag moog saib mas tsw pum Yexu lub cev tuag lawm.
Thaus puab tseed xaav tsw thoob rua tej nuav ua cav txawm muaj ob tug yawm naav tsoog tsho ci ntsaa ab lug sawv ze ntawm puab.
Puab ntshai heev hab nyo lub plhu rua huv peg teb, mas ob tug yawm hov txawm has rua puab tas, “Ua caag mej nrhav tug tuabneeg caj huv cov tuabneeg tuag?
Nwg tsw nyob ntawm nuav, nwg tub caj sawv rov lug lawm. Ca le ncu txug tej lug kws thaus tseed nyob huv Kalilai nwg has rua mej tas,
‘Tuabneeg leej Tub yuav tsum raug muab cob rua huv cov tuabneeg muaj txem txhais teg, hab yuav raug muab teem rua sau khaublig ntoo, mas peb nub yuav caj sawv rov lug.’ ”
Tes puab txhad ncu dheev txug Yexu tej lug,
hab rov tom lub ntxaa lug pav tej xwm txheej nuav huvsw rua kaum ib tug tubkhai hab lwm tug kws nyob ntawd noog.
Cov kws pav tej xwm txheej nuav rua cov tubkhai noog yog Maivlag Mantala hab Yau‑ana hab Maivlag kws yog Yakaunpau nam hab lwm tug quaspuj kws nrug puab ua ke.
Tassws cov tubkhai pum tas tej lug hov tsw muaj tseeb txhad tsw ntseeg cov quaspuj has.
[Tassws Petu sawv tseeg dha moog tom lub ntxaa. Thaus nyo xauj rua huv tsuas pum tej ntaub maag xwb, txawm rov lug phemfwj kawg rua tej xwm txheej kws tshwm lug ntawd.]
Tuab nub ntawd muaj ob tug thwjtim taug kev moog rua ib lub zog npe hu ua Ema‑u, nyob deb ntawm Yeluxalee kwvlaam kaum ib kilumeb.
Ob tug sws thaam txug txhua yaam xwm txheej kws tshwm lug nuav.
Thaus ob tug saamswm sws thaam sws nug ntawd, Yexu txawm lug ze nrug ob tug taug kev ua ke moog.
Tassws ob tug qhov muag plooj lawm cim tsw tau Yexu.
Yexu has rua ob tug tas, “Thaus taug kev tuaj meb sws thaam txug daabtsw?” Ob tug txawm nreg nkaus ua plhu mluag mlob.
Tug kws npe hu ua Khelaupa txawm teb Yexu tas, “Koj tuab leeg yog qhua huv Yeluxalee kws tsw paub tej xwm txheej kws tshwm lug ob peb nub nua lov?”

Yexu has rua ob tug tas, “Xwm txheej daabtsw?” Ob tug teb nwg tas, “Tej xwm txheej kws tshwm rua Yexu kws yog tuabneeg Naxale. Nwg yog ib tug xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug kws muaj fwjchim ua num hab has tau lug tseem ceeb taab meeg Vaajtswv hab taab meeg cov tuabneeg suavdawg,
mas peb cov pov thawj hlub hab cov thawj muab nwg cob rua luas rau txem tuag hab muab teem rua sau khaublig ntoo.
Peb tub vaam tas nwg yuav ua tug kws txhwv cov Yixayee dim. Dua le ntawd, nub nua yog nub peb kws muaj tej xwm txheej hov tshwm lug.
Cov quaspuj kws nrug peb ua ke muaj qee leej ua rua peb phemfwj heev. Puab sawv moog tom lub qhov ntxaa,
mas tsw pum Yexu lub cev tuag lawm. Puab rov lug pav tas puab ua yug quas toog pum ob tug tubkhai ntuj has tas tug hov tseed muaj txujsa nyob.
Peb cov qee leej txawm moog tom lub qhov ntxaa mas pum lawv le cov quaspuj has, tassws tsw pum Yexu.”
Yexu txawm has rua ob tug tas, “Au tuabneeg ruag hab tsw kub sab ntseeg txhua yaam kws cov xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug has ca lawd.
Tug Kheto yeej yuav tsum raug txom nyem le ntawd txhad le tau nwg tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab los tsw yog?”
Tes Yexu txawm txhais Vaajtswv txujlug txhua nqai kws ntswg txug nwg rua ob tug noog chiv hlo ntawm Mauxe moog rua cov xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug huvsw.
Thaus puab tuaj ze lub zog kws yuav moog ntawd, Yexu txawm ua le nwg yuav dhau plhawv moog.
Tassws ob tug cheem cheem nwg has tas, “Koj ca le nrug ib su ua ke vem tub yuav tsaus ntuj hab nub yuav poob qho.” Yexu txhad nkaag moog nrug ob tug su.
Thaus Yexu nrug ob tug nyob tsawg ntawm rooj mov, nwg txawm muab ncuav lug thov Vaajtswv foom koob moov, hab muab ndais cev rua ob tug.
Tes ob tug qhov muag txawm qheb hlo ob tug txhad cim tau Yexu. Tes Yexu txawm pluj plag ntawm ob tug moog lawm.
Ob tug txawm sws thaam tas, “Ib ob leeg lub sab kub quas lug rua thaus nwg nrug ib thaam taug kev hab thaus nwg txhais Vaajtswv txujlug rua ib noog los tsw yog?”
Ob tug txawm sawv tseeg taamswm hov rov moog rua Yeluxalee, mas ntswb kaum ib tug tubkhai hab cov kws nrug puab ua ke tuaj txoos ua ke.
Puab has tas, “Tug Tswv caj sawv rov lug lawm tag tag le, nwg tub lug tshwm rua Ximoo pum.”
Ob tug hov txawm pav tej kws tshwm taug kev hab qhov kws ob tug paub Yexu rua thaus muab ncuav ndais hov, rua puab noog.
Thaus ob tug saamswm pav txug zaaj nuav, Yexu txawm lug sawv ntsug huv plawv puab, hab has rua puab tas, [“Mej ca le nyob kaaj sab lug.”]
Puab poob sab ntshai kawg, puab xaav tas pum ib tug daab.
Yexu has rua puab tas, “Mej ntxhuv sab ua daabtsw? Vem le caag mej tsw tso sab ntseeg?
Ca le saib kuv txhais teg hab kuv txhais kwtaw yeej yog kuv ntaag. Hab kov kuv lub cev saib, tsua qhov daab tsw muaj nqaj muaj txhaa yaam le mej pum kuv muaj.”
[Thaus has le ntawd taag, Yexu txawm muab nwg txhais teg txhais kwtaw rua puab saib.]
Thaus puab tseed tsw tshua ntseeg vem yog zoo sab hab tseed saamswm phemfwj, Yexu txawm has rua puab tas, “Ntawm nuav mej muaj daabtsw noj los tsw muaj?”
Puab txawm muab ib qhov ntseg ci rua Yexu,
nwg txawm noj taab meeg puab.

Yexu has rua puab tas, “Nuav yog tej lug kws kuv has rua mej rua thaus kuv tseed nrug mej nyob tas txhua lu lug kws sau ca rua huv Mauxe phoo kevcai hab sau rua huv cov xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug hab huv ntawv nkauj kws has txug kuv puavleej yeej yuav tsum tav.”
Hab Yexu qheb puab lub sab kuas to taub Vaajtswv txujlug,
hab has rua puab tas, “Muaj lug sau ca has tas tug Kheto yuav tsum raug kev tswm txom hab peb nub yuav caj sawv huv qhov tuag rov lug,
hab yuav tsum tuav tug Kheto lub npe tshaaj tawm qhov kws ntxeev dua sab tshab hab qhov kws daws tau lub txem rua txhua haiv tuabneeg noog, yuav chiv ntawm Yeluxalee moog.
Mej yog cov kws ua timkhawv rua tej nuav ntaag.
Saib maj, kuv yuav tso yaam kws kuv leej Txwv cog lug tseg lawm lug rua sau mej. Tassws mej yuav tsum nyob huv lub nroog tog moog txug thaus mej tau naav tug fwjchim kws lug sau ntuj lug.”
Yexu txawm coj puab tawm moog txug lub zog Npethani, mas nwg tsaa ob txhais teg foom koob moov rua puab.
Thaus nwg saamswm foom koob moov hov, nwg txawm ncaim puab moog lawm, hab nwg raug coj moog sau ntuj.
Puab txawm pe hawm nwg hab rov lug rua huv Yeluxalee zoo sab kawg,
hab naj nub nyob huv lub tuam tsev qhuas Vaajtswv.
